name: Hot Wheels Unleashed 2: AcceleRacers Free Pack 1
description: Iridium from Team Silencerz and RD-05 from Racing Drones. Two almost opposite vehicles, speed and elegance vs strength and massive muscles. A perfect mix to add to your personal garage, that true AcceleRacers fans can't miss.

name: Ancraophobia
description: Ghost hunting survival game where you identify and catch ghosts. Play alone or with friends this horror game is sure to be enjoyable.

name: Endless Road Runner
description: As the Road Runner, you jump over the cacti during your run while avoiding Wile E. Coyote's rockets that follow you.

name: Soliopop
description: High speed, airborne, arcade action! Bounce the ball off platforms to gain score, hit targets to multiply incoming score, and avoid falling off the map.

name: Soul Shifters: Online
description:
This is an exploration-focused game, so there's no predefined path to follow or a specific sequence of missions to complete; you are free to explore and discover its mysteries.
Face and absorb various daemons, open mysterious chests on the map, talk to NPCs. While there's no set mission sequence, some of them will open up new possibilities and paths for you.

name: Pincrediball
description: The Automata Pinball Wizard game! YOU design the machine and the Automata Pinball Wizard plays it to get a High Score. Earn medals to advance levels and build ever more extensive machines!

name: Dragon Ball FighterZ: Legendary Edition
description:
The Legendary Edition includes:
• DRAGON BALL FighterZ
• FighterZ Pass
• FighterZ Pass 2
• FighterZ Pass 3
• Android 21 (Lab Coat)
• Android 21 Unlock
• Commentator Voice Packs 1-4
• Stamps: Girls Pack
• Exclusive SS Goku Lobby Avatar
• 4 Extra Stamps

DRAGON BALL FighterZ is born from what makes the DRAGON BALL series so loved and famous: endless spectacular fights with its all-powerful fighters.

name: Infinite Mario 64
description: What if you could play Super Mario 64... forever? A random level generator for Super Mario 64, using libsm64 and Godot Engine as a base.
A short and silly game made only on Feb 29 only for Feb 29.

name: Full of Crap
description: Full of Crap is a card game. This game is a game of eating curry without poop while avoiding curry with poop. You watch their behavior carefully and eat a lot of curry without poop.

name: Anime Girls: Sun of a Beach
description: Brave beach girls battle crab-like monsters! Choose your anime girl, arm up, and defend the shores by shooting down crabs in epic battles against the deep sea!

name: The Warehouse
description: A simple horror collection game set in a warehouse outside of space and time

name: The Wolf's Hunt
description: Third Person action game where you are a wolf trying to save your wolf cubs.

name: Tiff and Tussle
description: An indie fighting game about rabbits and other rodents!

name: Olllo
description: Manipulate space and open the way!

name: Escape Game: The Old Folk House
description: I paid a visit to a traditional folk house in a mountain village. I dozed off by the hearth…… I woke up to find an unbelievable situation……！？

name: Matsukeke Burst!
description:
Connect the lines drawn on the panels to create and erase large and small loops in this new type of falling object puzzle.
The player must create larger loops more quickly than his or her opponent to collect power and activate skills! Players send their panels to each other to compete.

The game features a story mode with a total of 9 playable characters, 2-player battles, and a Score Attack mode where you can carefully create huge loops and large chains.
Based on the original submission for "SmileBASIC4", new characters and scenarios have been added, and the production has been enhanced, the game system has been strengthened, and the balance has been adjusted

name: Hentai Girls: Sweet Doctor
description: Meet over 30 pretty anime girls in this relaxing puzzle game!

name: Desktop Baseball 2
description: Get ready for an all-new and improved baseball experience! Assemble an original team like no other!

name: The Sims 4: Crystal Creations
description: Craft dazzling jewelry and give your creations a spark of power with The Sims 4 Crystal Creations Stuff Pack.

name: The Corridors
description: Unravel sanity's edge in The Corridors. Hop, solve, survive – or feed the shadows.

name: Ruined
description: The world has been RUINED. You awake to a mysterious world overrun by monsters. Journey through the mountains with an army of monsters by your side to uncover the secrets of this world and rebuild hope!

name: Drone Racer: Fly Stunt Simulator
description: Pilot a radio-controlled and get ready for high speed drone racing in this realistic fly drone simulator!

name: RaceTrap
description: RaceTrap pits a team of drivers against a pantheon of racing gods. Play cards to sabotage the track the drivers are racing on as a god. As a driver, complete 3 laps with your life intact!

name: Matches Puzzle 2: Classic Logic Arcade
description: A matchstick puzzle with matches is a real training for logic, intelligence and creative thinking!

name: Cape's Escape Game 7th Room
description: Solve the mystery and escape from the room

name: Time Trap: Hidden Objects
description: Unravel the mystery of a missing journalist by investigating an apocalyptic zone full of anomalies and dangerous secrets.

name: The Fixer of the Adventurer's Guild
description: Sin descripción

name: Take It Racing 2
description: Pseudo-racing game for a retro console. Win races, buy cars, level up!

name: Rain Runner
description: Rain Runner is a short, blood-pumping speedrunning FPS where you ditch your keyboard and only use your mouse! You'll run constantly where you look, shoot targets and dash through challenging platforms. No checkpoints, no pauses: beat it in one sitting! Run, die, learn, repeat. Be better, be faster.

name: I Commissioned Some Cats 11
description: I paid artists to hide cats and wool in 50 pieces of artwork. Can you find them all? Warning: Relaxing.

name: Matching Meadows
description: Matching Meadows is a deck-based puzzle game that combines the simple pleasures of building a vibrant city with challenging objectives. Build your own idyllic landscape! To reach the top of the leaderboards, you'll have to strategize and carefully plan ahead.

name: Math Dash
description: Test your math skills and reflexes. Fast-paced and challenging, so you will need to be quick on your feet to succeed. With multiple levels of difficulty, Math Dash is perfect for players of all skill levels.

name: Her Trees: The Puzzle House
description: "Her Trees: The Puzzle House" is an unusual escape game. There are no items to acquire, You have to move and combine objects to solve the password. Solve the mystery of this strange room.

name: Spirit Island: Jagged Earth
description: The battle against the colonizing Invaders rages on! Jagged Earth brings more Spirits, more Powers, and more Island Boards. But the Invaders are more numerous and more capable than ever before. New Adversaries, Events, Fear, and Blight cards add more variety and danger than ever before!

name: Infinite Dissonance
description: A Roguelite, Co-op, turn-based strategy, dungeon crawling game, where you can journey with friends into randomly generated dungeons to fight enemies, collect loot and improve your powers.

name: Nonograms: Engineering
description: 20x20 - 6 puzzles ||| 25x 25 - 6 puzzles ||| 30x30 - 6 puzzles ||| 35x35 - 2 puzzles

name: Nonograms: Herbals
description: 20x20 - 6 puzzles ||| 25x 25 - 6 puzzles ||| 30x30 - 6 puzzles ||| 35x35 - 2 puzzles

name: Nonograms: Fruits
description: 20x20 - 6 puzzles ||| 25x 25 - 6 puzzles ||| 30x30 - 6 puzzles ||| 35x35 - 2 puzzles

name: Nonograms: Vegetables
description: 20x20 - 6 puzzles ||| 25x 25 - 6 puzzles ||| 30x30 - 6 puzzles ||| 35x35 - 2 puzzles

name: Nonograms: Fishing
description: 20x20 - 6 puzzles ||| 25x 25 - 6 puzzles ||| 30x30 - 6 puzzles ||| 35x35 - 2 puzzles

name: Nonograms: Jewelry
description: 20x20 - 6 puzzles ||| 25x 25 - 6 puzzles ||| 30x30 - 6 puzzles ||| 35x35 - 2 puzzles

name: Nonograms: Food
description: 20x20 - 6 puzzles ||| 25x 25 - 6 puzzles ||| 30x30 - 6 puzzles ||| 35x35 - 2 puzzles

name: Nonograms: Pirates
description: 20x20 - 6 puzzles ||| 25x 25 - 6 puzzles ||| 30x30 - 6 puzzles ||| 35x35 - 2 puzzles

name: Nonograms: Weapons
description: 20x20 - 6 puzzles ||| 25x 25 - 6 puzzles ||| 30x30 - 6 puzzles ||| 35x35 - 2 puzzles

name: Nonograms
description: Nonograms is a relaxing puzzle game where you use logic and creativity. Your goal is to reveal hidden pictures by filling in specific grid cells, based on numerical clues provided for each row and column. The games in this genre are also known as Picross, Griddlers, Pic-a-Pix, Hanjie, etc.

name: Flappy Box
description: Atelier 58l0, in collaboration with designer Saul Kim, presents "Architecture Anomaly" in the virtual environment of Flappy Box. A single-player, exploration game of architecture and design, Flappy Box invites visitors to explore the intersection of creativity, curiosity, and design philosophy.

name: Nyctophobia: Fear the Dark
description: Nyctophobia is a thrilling physiological horror game that challenges players to confront a terrifying SCP that preys on their deepest fears. The game takes place in a neighborhood where players must navigate through the darkness and uncover the mystery behind the strange occurrences.

name: Ending Name
description: "People can only endure pain after seeing the pain of others." He believes this. Between beautiful dreams and cruel reality, he would not hesitate to choose the former. This is the narrow and prejudiced short text adventure game "终末之名".

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Dreamseeking Voyage
description:
Version 7.3 of Honkai Impact 3rd, marking the beginning of Part 2 of the main story, which includes:
• New Part 2 Story Chapter 1: Hundred Years of Solitary Shadow
• New S Rank Valkyrie: Deepspace Anchor: First Light (Senadina)
• New A Rank Valkyries: Valkyrie Boltstorm (Helia) & Valkyrie Blastmetal (Coralie)
• New Story Exploration Mode
• New Permanent Realms of Battle Mode
• New Featured Event: A Feast Sought in Data
• New AstralOp System
• New AstralOps: Songque & Dreamseeker
• Supply System Rework
• Continued UI Overhaul
• Removal of Coop Modes
• ...and more!

name: Battle Clash
description: Battle Clash is a medieval multiplayer PVP game. On spawn, each player is randomly assigned a medieval class and forced to battle against other players. Reach a kill streak to unlock your class's ultimate attack, and dominate the battlefield. When the timer ends, the player with the most kills wins!

name: AstroForge: Space Pirates
description: Build your unique spaceship and explore space. Travel between planets, fight different opponents, trade and develop. Build the most efficient ship and fight with other players in multiplayer. 17 languages available.

name: The C64 Collection 3
description:
13 great titles from the classic home computer system arrive on one physical Evercade cartridge! The C64 Collection 3 brings even more games from the 80s and 90s that live long in the memory of gamers all over the world.

The games included are Summer Games II, Boulder Dash, Heavy Metal Paradroid, Super Cycle, Jumpman Junior, Cyberdyne Warrior, Cybernoid II: The Revenge, Netherworld, Deliverance: Stormlord II, Anarchy, Exolon, Street Sports Soccer and Break Dance.

name: Winter Cats
description: Hidden Winter Cats - Find and paint 100 hidden cats in this big snowy location! Test your attention and relax in this cozy and free game

name: Edge of Death
description: Edge Of DeathIt is a first-person horror survival adventure game. Players will experience various illusions between life and death with the protagonist, and experience a journey to the edge of death.

name: Main Deity Space
description: The journey of endless slaughter and reincarnation, survive together with your companions.

name: Bar Stella Abyss
description: Bar Stella Abyss sees players take the role of a faceless wanderer who is drawn to Stella Abyss, a bar hidden in a mysterious corner of the city. Players will build a party and explore the dream-like Drunken World.

name: Welcome to Paradize
description: Paradise isn't exactly what you hoped for: it's infested with zombies! Thankfully, you can control them. Capture them and teach them to farm or fight. They will help you defend your camp while you explore the world looking for… a new paradise.

name: Cyber Puncake
description: Welcome to your favorite TV show “Goodies Everyday”. "BD Plus" that lets you live different lives in others’ brains. Be a gangster, a pineapple dragon boss, or a snack stall master. Come and watch the first part of BD Plus: Cyber Puncake, where you control the stall master to cook pancakes.

name: Boba Bar: Bubble Tea Tycoon
description: Boba Bar: Bubble Tea Tycoon is a Kawaii themed pixel art game where you start your journey with a humble drink stand. Learn new recipes and unlock new equipment and locations, manage sales prices and inventory in order to succeed in becoming the largest bubble tea tycoon in town!

name: Journey of the Forgotten
description: Jump into the tactical RPG that is Journey of the Forgotten and follow young Quia on her journey to unravel the mysteries that were revealed in her vision. Can you gather the four energies, restore the balance and confront the true evil in the end? And will you do it alone?

name: Ufouria: The Saga 2
description:
The remake/sequel to the 1991 SUNSOFT action game Ufouria: The Saga is here!
In this exploration-based side-scrolling action game, the levels' terrain changes every time you enter the area, with even more secrets to find.
The unique and wacky world of Ufouria has been lovingly and faithfully recreated, this time with a handmade feltwork twist.
Join the now fluffy Hebe, O-Chan, Sukezaemon, and Jennifer to protect the earth from the Utsujin invasion!

name: Lady of Bones, a Mother's Legacy
description: It always rains, they call it The Haze. Ghosts haunt every alley, every gray corner of the city. Lady of Bones is a visual novel that explores the darkest depths of existence where Maya will discover the horrible secrets of her mother's legacy.

name: Ancient Wonders: Gardens of Babylon
description: Play through more than 100 hex-match-3 link style levels and earn enough gold to fully decorate the Gardens of Babylon!

name: Ghost Hunters
description: Ghost Hunters is a cooperative horror game. In which you play as one of 4 ghostbusters. You choose a contract / house where the hell is going on, and you and your team will have to deal with it.

name: Shoot & Sow
description: Shoot & Sow is a top-down arena shooter roguelite, where players control unique characters and fight vegetables and fruits. Players can plant seeds to grow special items, as well as buy a variety of weapons and items. Complete the talent tree to gain more power. Can you survive on your own farm?

name: I Commissioned Some Cats 0
description: Play for free! I paid artists to hide cats and wool in 15 pieces of artwork. Can you find them all? Warning: Relaxing.

name: Matsurika no Kei: Tenmeiin Iden
description:
“This is an ancient melody without a reciter.”

Chinese-style high fantasy x glittering romance.

name: 100 Rounds
description: A die and retry with 100 levels, simple gameplay and hours of rage quit.

name: Astral Party
description: 'Astral Party' is a party game supports online multiplayer with up to 4 players. Choose your favorite character, utilize their skills and cards to fight against your friends. A myriad of events lends an air of unpredictability to the game. Come on, join the 'friend' journey with your buddies!

name: Marchenkanna
description: A free RPG that lets you travel through a world with a picture book-like ambience. The story takes place in a peaceful world where wizards live. In battle scenes, a unique system allows you to specify the shape of attacks according to the enemy's position. Fun for everyone from beginners to gamers!

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Part 2 - Extinguished Starlight and Rekindled Fire
description: Follows the Dreamseeker, an engineering student from the cyberpunk-inspired metropolis of Oxia City, as they embark on a journey to explore the Sea of Data through the Anchor of the Apocalypse. Along the way, they will encounter new companions and friends, and uncover the ancient secrets of the Honkai war and the enigmatic Goddess who has long watched over the planet. Their adventures will lead them on a mission to save the Martian bubble universes from falling into the corrupting power of the Sea of Data, eventually leading to the meeting of the people of Earth and Mars.

name: The Collar
description: What would it be like to be taken from your normal life and be pitted against random strangers. Would you fight and kill to survive?

name: Tomboy: Love in Hot Forge
description: Tomboy: Love in Hot Forge is a medieval VN about guy who was left on the street without money. Bridgid is a blacksmith girl who invited you to spend the night at her house. Find out what difficulties you will face and how your relationship will develop.

name: Unknown Dungeon
description: Explore randomly generated maze with lots of treasures, puzzles and monsters. Help people, do quests, explore the dungeon, obtain treasures, gain experience and find out the history of the world!

name: Final Fantasy VII Remake & Rebirth: Digital Deluxe Twin Pack
description:
Digital Deluxe Twin Pack Contents:
・ Final Fantasy VII Remake Intergrade main game
・ Final Fantasy VII Rebirth main game
・ Digital art book
・ Digital mini soundtrack
・ Summon Materia: Magic Pot
・ Accessory: Reclaimant Choker
・ Armor: Orchid Bracelet

developers.name: Square Enix Creative Business Unit I

name: Final Fantasy VII Remake & Rebirth: Twin Pack
description: This is a combined set of Final Fantasy VII Remake Intergrade and Final Fantasy VII Rebirth, the two first entries in the trilogy of the Final Fantasy VII remake project.

developers.name: Square Enix Creative Business Unit I

name: Final Fantasy VII Rebirth: Collector's Edition
description:
Content of the Collector's Edition:
・ Final Fantasy VII Rebirth: Deluxe Edition (includes: mini art book, mini soundtrack, steelbook)
・ Sephiroth Static Arts figure
・ Moogle Trio Summoning Materia (DLC)
・ Magic Pot Summoning Materia (DLC)
・ Accessory: Reclaimant Choker (DLC)
・ Armor: Orchid Bracelet (DLC)
・ Armor: Midgar Bangle Mk. II (DLC)

developers.name: Square Enix Creative Business Unit I

name: Final Fantasy VII Rebirth: Deluxe Edition
description:
Content of the Deluxe Edition:
・ Final Fantasy VII Rebirth main game
・ Mini art book
・ Mini soundtrack
・ Steelbook

developers.name: Square Enix Creative Business Unit I

name: Final Fantasy VII Rebirth: Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
Content of the Digital Deluxe Edition:
・ Final Fantasy VII Rebirth main game
・ Digital art book
・ Digital mini soundtrack
・ Summon Materia: Magic Pot
・ Accessory: Reclaimant Choker
・ Armor: Orchid Bracelet

developers.name: Square Enix Creative Business Unit I

name: Picross S+
description:
A port/remake of the 3DS's Picross e series using the engine of the Nintendo Switch's Picross S series.

Notable changes include the translation of the puzzles from Picross e's Micross mode to the Picross S series' Clip Picross mode, as well as additional Picross and Color Picross puzzles unique to this release.

The base game includes all 150 puzzles from the first Picross e release in both Picross and Mega Picross forms, while puzzles from the remaining Picross e games are available as individual DLC packs.

name: Keep Flip
description: Technical game that make you use your mind and skills by taking control of a vehicle named Tweely that flips with ease. Drive across a large number of challenges. Climb perilous obstacles, navigate water hazards, and play with bottles. Don't let the challenges dissuade you, by mastering Tweely, you can become an unstoppable driver and conquer every challenge.

name: Multiplayer Platform Golf
description: A 3D golf game with platforming and online multiplayer.

name: Furry Myth
description: Furry Myth is about amazing myths of ancient Greece and charming furry characters! Embark on an adventure!

name: The Paradixion: Laboratory
description: The Paradixion: Laboratory is the second installment in the "The Paradixion" series, created by a solo South Korean developer. It's a point-and-click adventure game with a mysterious atmosphere.

name: Idle Weaponshop
description: In Idle Weaponshop, you are handed your very own weapon shop to manage. Design and sell weapons, build up your local community, hire employees, and send adventurers off into danger for fun and profit... all before prestiging to earn powerful bonuses, all so you can do it all over again.

name: The Cable Guy
description: Your job is to connect all the users from different projects to their servers in the procedurally generated network. In an ever changing office environment you'll have a lot of nifty tools to help you save your job and keep everyone from losing their cool. Are you up for the challenge?

name: Forest of Strays
description: Forest of Strays is a hardcore platformer with many dangers scattered across the stages. Try and retry to complete every level while collecting every leaf along the way, fighting enemies, evading traps and getting trough very precise jumps! Will the lost girl find her cat and return back home?

name: Scrap Warden
description: Bring order to space in your own way in Scrap Warden! An epic action strategy through junk filled space missions and enemies. Explore various worlds, battle AI driven pirates and collect material to cobble together advanced weaponry and upgrades, all in a beautiful, and dangerous universe.

name: Fantastic Fist
description: While controlling a giant fist with your mouse, help Vivi go on a quest to punch the wizard who stole her arms. This surreal platforming game is focused on simultaneous keyboard and mouse controls.

name: ChronoDojo
description: ChronoDojo is a cute, cooperative tower defense beat 'em up game in which humble heroes travel time to bash, build and save the world!

name: H.I.A: Horror Investigation Agency
description: H.I.A: Horror Investigation Agency is a fun multiplayer horror game in which you and co-players have to investigate unique horror cases. Among finding victims and evidence of the horror event that has taken place, you will be faced with jumpscares and scary monsters along your investigation.

name: A Void Hope
description: A Void Hope takes you on an atmospheric puzzle platforming adventure to find a cure for a collapsed city. Follow the story of a tormented couple as they try to decipher reality from nightmares and overcome the shadowy threats lurking in the dark.

name: Indie Heroes Collection 3
description:
Indie Heroes Collection 3 will feature all 9 indie Game of the Month releases for 2023 along with some extra titles to be revealed ahead of its release in February 2024.

Game of the Month adds a free game through monthly system updates that are removed with the next release. The monthly games starting in April as part of this bundle were Donut Dodo, Thunder Paws, Big2Small, Magic & Legend: Time Knights and currently Doodle World: Redrawn.

name: Isop0dyssey
description: trash-infested power fantasy sandbox with puzzle, racing & crustacean elements set in the gritty, segregated world of ocean floor society

name: Type King
description: Type King has three different game modes: Typing, Jumping and those combined makes Type King! With some variety and different difficulties there is a total of fifteen levels to beat before you can be crowned the Type King!

name: Champion Shift
description: Unleash mythic heroes and their mighty vehicles in this thrilling co-op action roguelike. Seamlessly shift into car form, create builds with unique abilities, and battle endless enemies to stop the evil Dominion. Rev through high-octane missions, conquer epic bosses, and become an absolute legend!

name: Little Devils
description: After centuries of being misjudged for being "devils", a young Tasmanian devil agrees to descend to the depths of hell to restore his ancestors honor. Challenge yourself with hundreds of hand-crafted screens and uncover what secrets lie with Satan at the depths of hell... you know... for fun!

name: Doors and Doors
description: doors and doors is a short horror adventure, you wake up in a kindergarten and you don't remember how you got there. You learn details about a toy that comes to life while trying to escape from there.

name: Taka Taka
description: Taka Taka is a Japanese-folklore-inspired rhythm game. Play as Tengu and Oni, an unlikely pair attempting to survive a world of Yokai. Match the characters with their colorized notes and face increasingly more conniving enemies in order to progress through the world of Yokai.

name: Tamarak Trail
description: In this deck-building roguelike, you'll use a customizable dice set as you battle through randomly generated trails - full of loot, mysteries, and danger to protect inhabitants from the evil that has corrupted the trail.

name: Goblin Slayer Another Adventurer: Nightmare Feast
description: Goblin Slayer Another Adventurer: Nightmare Feast is an upcoming tactical RPG game based on the dark fantasy light novel series Goblin Slayer, developed by Apollosoft and Mebius and published by Bushiroad Games.

name: Coin Pusher Casino
description: Coinpusher Casino is a game that brings the excitement of classic coin pusher machines to your computer. With realistic physics and colorful graphics, you'll feel like you're playing the real thing.

name: Duel Revolution
description: A new monster taming MMORPG with a strategic real-time Duel system, Open World Exploration, Messaging System, Day and Night Cycles and continuous Storyline. Take on this ever changing adventure and more in the world of Bitacora.

name: Dummy Dungeon
description: Fight your way through randomly generated dungeons in this hardcore rouge-lite game. Discover your favorite character from a group of unique heroes, get powerful weapons and power-ups to save beautiful princesses in need.

name: Thyria
description: Thyria is a RPG, with turn-based combat and isometric 2D exploration, playing on time management mechanics. Summon and train a team of Guardians, who will accompany Thyria into the minds of the cursed villagers. Help them vanquish their nightmares.

name: Direct Contact
description: Direct Contract is about Authentic Warfare, First-person Tactical realism experiences. Most weapons are in the same specs for each classification in today's world, making most modern combat asymmetrical.

name: Doggo Estates
description: Doggo Estates is a multiplayer third-person action game in which a dog has everything he needs to become a real estate mogul: his warm liquid gold! Compete with other neighborhood dogs and pee on as many houses as you can before they do.

name: Paradize Project
description: Fight, Hack, and Survive! Alone or with friends, explore a mysterious open-world infested by zombies. Collect materials, craft weapons, and fight for your life. Learn to hack zombies to assist in fighting, protecting, or farming. Welcome to Paradize!

name: The Unachievable Game
description: The Unachievable Game will be the hardest game you will ever play in your life nobody can finish this game.

name: Resonance Solstice
description: Resonance Solstice is a train simulation adventure RPG that combines real-time card battles with business simulation. Players take on the role of a train conductor onboard the train rented from COLUMBA and run through the continent to reconnect cities and regions to save the world from crisis.

name: Ad Infernum
description: Stranded at an abandoned gas station in the middle of the desert. Losing your grip on reality. Dark rituals. Demonic pursuers. No escape.

name: Robin Hood: Sherwood Builders
description: Robin Hood - Sherwood Builders is an action-adventure RPG with base-building elements, where you take on the role of a classic hero who stands up to the tyranny and injustice that haunts Sherwood. Fight, craft, steal, and of course help the local people grow and prosper.

name: Raige
description: A PSX-inspired, narrative-driven experience, Raige is a disturbing and confronting encounter with a grim world, its inhabitants, and yourself. Become one with Raige and the never-ending ride of morbid fascination. You can always stop, if you want.

name: Final Fantasy VII Rebirth
description: Final Fantasy VII Rebirth is the new story in the Final Fantasy VII remake project, a reimagining of the iconic original game into three standalone titles by its original creators. In this game, players will enjoy various new elements as the story unfolds, culminating in the midpoint from the original Final Fantasy VII.

developers.name: Square Enix Creative Business Unit I

name: Mysteryville 2
description: Will Laura figure out what is actually happening in this small rural town and close the case?

name: KeeperRL
description: KeeperRL is an ambitious dungeon simulator with roguelike and RPG elements. Take the role of an evil wizard and study the methods of black magic. Equip your minions and explore the world, murder innocent villagers and burn their homes. Build your dungeon, lay traps and prepare for an assault of angry heroes.

name: Secrets of Grindea
description: A fantasy Action RPG, playable by yourself or in co-op with up to three friends! Features an unrestricted skill system, fluid and challenging combat, and an engaging story. For additional value, there's also a fleshed out, challenging roguelike mode to truly put your ARPG skills to the test!

name: Mercurial Dreams
description: In 'Mercurial Dreams,' you're a cat plush toy whose mind mysteriously entwines with that of your young owner, a kid, shielding him from bad dreams. The game is set in 'Mercurial Village', a weird place with a river made of mercury and strange buildings. Your job is to keep the kid safe from scary dreams by playing mini-games and completing tasks inside strange buildings. 'Mercurial Dreams' is all about adventure, mystery, and being a hero in a dream world.

name: Guarded
description: Guarded is the first and only book of the Guarded series.

name: Mortal Kombat 1: Invasions - Season of the Huntress
description: Sin descripción

name: Pyramid
description: This is a short vapowave/horror first person adventure, completion time is around 10 minutes. It is inspired by Control, Severance and my experience working in a business corporation, so if you're into these things, you might enjoy this game too. This is the first part of a bigger experience, the following parts will come soon.

name: Andalusian Roulette
description: A game about sleeping siesta in a small rural village in Spain while socializing with some odd fellows.

name: Freyja's Demise
description: Quake map for Arcane Dimensions version 1.81

name: Noclip
description: Chapter-based Backrooms experience. Embark on a chilling journey through the unknown. Visuals based on early 2000's camcorders.

name: Broken Lands Village
description: The real world no longer exists! I was trapped in this cursed Village made of inkblots on parchment. Every day I'm stalked by an assasin and stuck in a time loop. None of the residents remember me, although I myself have memories. I need to get out of here ASAP

name: Three Verses
description: Three Verses is an adventure game / first person dungeoncrawler / typing game based on poetry. Having shed your corporeal form, you must now escape purgatory by completing the simple task of delivering verses from deities to struggling poets.

name: Brick Buster Blast
description: "Brick Buster Blast" is an addictive arcade game where your objective is to demolish all the bricks while grabbing power-ups that rain down from above to advance through each level.

name: Tumble Rush
description: A fast-paced marble maze that you control by tilting your device. Frantically tumble through physics-based tricks and traps.

name: Pepita Viajera Arctic
description: Pepita Viajera travels and lands in the Arctic and needs to recover the pieces of her plane. Help her recover the pieces by properly answering the questions that will be asked and avoiding multiple obstacles in this educational platform game.

name: Gord: The Alliance
description: Embark on a new adventure in The Alliance and continue your story in the dark world of Gord. Confront the relentless Calanthian attacks, forge alliances with untamed creatures, and engage in diplomatic parleys with formidable Horrors.

name: Color Summoners
description: Color Summoner" is a card game in which players play cards simultaneously on the same turn. Defeat your opponents by reading their actions!

name: Mirror World
description: This is an adventure game where a small person carrying a red backpack travels alone to the mysterious and beautiful desert in a world of pixelated wind.

name: Island Paradise
description: Island Paradise is a survival game where you build, upgrade, customize your own island and use nearby resources to create a home for generations to come!

name: Beyond the Fringe
description: Welcome to Beyond the Fringe, a single-player action/adventure set in a sci-fi universe with over seven different handcrafted maps to explore! Fight, fly, loot, mine, and craft your way through each world, searching for your mother and discovering the truth about the danger looming over the galaxy.

name: Full Speed Animals: Disorder
description: Let's escape from this planet by car? Fly in the sky with a sparrow? Can you run with a cheetah? Or... Customize your character by entering the pit during the game! "I have to use my skills! Gosh!!" "I'm so excited! I'm back!!" "What is that? A UFO!!" "Something is chasing me from behind!!"

name: Over the Net
description: Simple 2,5D volleyball. Just start game and enjoy it! 2 Game Modes (1vs1, 2vs2) | 4 Arenas (Beach, Castle, School and Mars) | 6 Colours to Choose Prove that you are the best volleyball player in the world!

name: Earth Defenders
description: During the game, you play the role of one of the army commanders who faces alien invaders.-Expand your base-Extract raw materials-Create troops-Counteract invaders

name: Doodle TD 2
description: Doodle TD Is back and better than before, Place and smack enemies down with force in this brand new tower defense game. We added color from the original game as the evil mastermind has colored the world of doodle land.

name: Crowborne
description: Crowborne is a 2D platformer With the ability to Melee, shoot Run and Fly around!

name: Forza Motorsport: 2018 Ford #98 Breathless Pro Racing TA Mustang
description: Forza Motorsport 2018 Ford #98 Breathless Pro Racing TA Mustang

name: Skyland Wars
description: Skyland Wars is a strategy game set in the world of sky islands. In this fantasy-filled sky world, you can send airship teams to freely navigate the sky, gather resources, and drive away roaming air pirates to construct your own sky city. You can also explore ruins and dungeons full of unknowns and challenges. Each adventure is a completely new experience, as you delve into dungeons with your heroes and troops, searching for ancient treasures while resisting unpredictable enemies and traps.

name: Secret Archives
description: This is a third person shooter game The main plot is a secret experiment being conducted somewhere in the future During this process, a strange mineral was discovered and caused a large-scale infection The protagonist's task is to retrieve important "files" and escape from this place!

name: Metaball: Red Astro Pack
description: 7 Legendary Items, 1 Stamp, 1 Emote, 500 Metanium, and 30 Beam Shards! This is the Red Astro Pack available at an affordable price! A once-in-a-lifetime opportunity, don't miss out!

name: Metaball: Kung Fu Pack
description: 7 Legendary Items, 1 Stamp, 1 Emote, 500 Metanium, and 30 Beam Shards! This is the Kung Fu package available at an affordable price! A once-in-a-lifetime opportunity, don't miss ou

name: Metaball: Guitar Man Pack
description: 7 Legendary Items, 1 Stamp, 1 Emote, 500 Metanium, and 30 Beam Shards! This is the Guitar Man Pack available at an affordable price! A once-in-a-lifetime opportunity, don't miss out!

name: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate Jigsaw: Variety Pack 23
description: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate, redefining digital puzzling.

name: DudeGo
description: Each map is different and has a challenge for you. Are you ready to conquer the unexpected? Prove that you can handle every challenge the game has to offer. Last survivor is the winner. will it be you?

name: Loli Racing
description: Loli Racing is a Japanese-style kart racing game, the overall operation difficulty is low and easy to get started, there are 15 types of karts and characters can choose from, in terms of maps, there are 38 tracks with different themes to play, support single-player and multiplayer

name: Fleximan
description: Simple, you're Fleximan and you have to remove all the speed cameras in the city.

name: Crystal Chip Collector: Hidden Gem
description: "Crystal Chip Collector: Hidden Gem" is a fast-paced platforming puzzle game with a neo-retro style. Collect all the microchips to complete each level and watch out for the critters! Initially, it may seem simple, but some of the later levels can get quite tricky.

name: Search All: Lollipops
description: is a hidden object game in which you need to find all the lollipops in a large location. The lollipops will be located in a variety of places, from the most prominent to barely noticeable places

name: Search All: Tools
description: Is a hidden object game in which you need to find all the tools (mainly construction tools) in a large location. The tools will be located in a variety of places, from the most prominent to the most barely noticeable places

name: World War II Shooting Simulator
description: Do you have what it takes to survive the onslaught and rewrite history?

name: Road Bustle Online
description: Road Bustle Online is a competitive online game for up to 8 players on the road in real-time, set in the streets of the Road Bustle world. Bright graphics and pulsating rhythms set the stage for adrenaline-filled sessions. Navigate your way through increasing traffic, dodge vehicles, and outsmart your opponents to reach the finish line. Ready? On your marks!

name: ZXnake
description: The objective is to eat as many alien bugs as possible while you avoid crashing with the walls, snake's own body and tombstones. Aliens can jump after some time. Stages will change after enough aliens have been eaten.

name: Killer at the Shop
description: Take your groceries and leave the shop without dying.

name: Cul-De-Sac
description: Cul-De-Sac is a ghost hunting game about finding a cursed item and destroying it.

name: Super Squishy Square Stacker
description:
Inspired by the likes of Not Tetris and C4D4U's "Satisfying Softbody Tetris" animations; this game sees you controlling jelly-like tetrominos, arranging them in such a way that clears rows, and draining the remaining residue with the two vents at the bottom of the field. Play ends once you've collected enough jelly to fill a container of variable size, depending on which mode you've picked.

The available containers hold a pint (~17 lines), a quart (~33 lines), and a gallon(~133 lines) each. Upon completion, you'll be shown your final time and score, allowing you to decide which to focus on.

name: Disney Dreamlight Valley: The Laugh Floor
description: The 9th free update for Dreamlight Valley brings the Monsters, inc Realm, Mike Wazowski and Sulley as Villagers, the Lovely Monsters Star Path, an expansion to Scrooge's Shop and new items on the Premium Shop.

name: Mountain King Return
description:
"It is tell than deep inside the Mountain lies the Golden Crown of a long forgotten king. No one knows the glory that awaits to the one who achieve to retrieve the crown to the peak of the Mountain.

But beware, the Mountain won't let anyone bring its darkest secrets to light."

Mountain King Return is a non-official sequel to the 1983 game by E.F.Dreyer, Mountain King released by CBS Electronics.

name: Timber
description: Build and manage your industrial empire unlike ever before. Dive into Timber: where strategic resource management meets city-building excitement.

name: Stupid Teammates
description: As a mage, you'll fight alongside two "Scrapwood teammates." Unleash different spells by pressing key inputs. Diverse enemies, rich spell combinations and entry choices, as well as boss haunts and special levels, bring players a rich and wonderful game experience.

name: Tank Frenzy
description: Sin descripción

name: Ukraine War 2022
description: Ukraine War 2022 is a real-time, tactical land and air warfare simulation game focusing on the ongoing war between Ukraine and Russia.

name: WhichWayOut?
description: WhichWayOut? is a dark themed physics puzzle platformer.

name: Winter Night
description: "Winter Night" presents a story inspired by beliefs in Thailand. Players will experience the atmosphere of an ancient, mysterious mansion.presented through 2D PixelArt.

name: Steamboat Willie
description: Welcome to a bone-chilling horror experience set a world inspired by the iconic Steamboat Willie cartoon and Slender: The eight pages. You are a daring cargo collector, navigating through an eerie forest, collecting valuable cargo while desperately avoiding the nightmarish duo, Mickey and Minnie.

name: Sunray OS
description: You just bought a PC, only to discover it once belonged to someone who has mysteriously disappeared. You soon realize that the key to find him may be hidden deep inside your OS, governed by a weird chatbot named Zippy. What will be your first move?

name: Rokumenhappi
description: Dice are fun! Everyone knows the rule that if you roll it, the position of the surface will change. This geme is a puzzle game that arranges such dice.

name: Upward
description: Upward is a platform game where we progress upwards, overcoming obstacles on an island where we crashed with a plane accident. On 10 different levels, each featuring distinct colors, various platforms, and challenges await you.

name: Rock and Roots
description: Rock and Roots is a captivating VR journey where you wield the power to dictate the ebb and flow of battle. Summon your enigmatic guardians of the woods with a magical hand to face the challenges. Conjure spells, dive into the magic world and reclaim your rightful place on the throne!

name: Brothers: A Tale of Two Sons Remake
description: Guide two brothers on an epic journey of discovery, loss, adventure and mystery remade for the latest generation of graphics, performance, and gameplay. Play in single-player mode or local co-op with a friend. This is one journey you will never forget.

name: Kurofune: Descobrimentos Portugueses
description: A resource management and decision making complex game focused on Portuguese culture.

name: Quantum Contours
description: From zero to hero: Outgun alien hordes in a rogue-lite bullet hell adventure. Fight through waves of randomized enemies in procedurally generated levels with fresh, new upgrades every run.

name: Scary Psycho Lady Simulator
description: Descend into psychological horror with 'Scary Psycho Lady' on Steam. Uncover a twisted plot as Ikoma, Rina, and the Psycho Lady navigate a chilling narrative of deception, betrayal, and murder. Solve puzzles, confront fear, and survive the sinister journe

name: Minami Lane
description: Welcome to Minami Lane! Make yourself a cozy little street where people hang out and enjoy their time. Add and customize buildings, manage your shops and watch life unfold in your tiny neighborhood.

name: Brain Hotel: Remodeled
description: Comic Book inspired Pont & Click adventure. You play as delivery man, Ed Arnold, who has the misfortune of delivering a package to the Brain Hotel on the eve of their annual super-villain convention.

name: Chunky Tomato
description: Chunky Tomato is a platform game in which you'll help a tomato, fortunately equipped with legs, to escape from a chunky tomato factory. All you have to do is cross the road. But watch out for the cars!

name: Fool's End
description: Fool's End is a single-player puzzle-platformer mining game. Dig and destroy everything in your path, outsmart monsters and mine your path to complete each level. There's always another way to escape...

name: Popper Lands Colony
description: A new colony is appearing in popper lands! Skilled works are needed to harvest precious resources and build a friendly and prosperous village!

name: Tempest: Tower of Probatio
description: Tempest: Tower of Probatio presents a new standard for those who are bored with card games that use the same deck every time and take more than 10 minutes. The collective card game Tempest: Tower of Probatio, which is incredibly simple and unimaginably strategic! Comming Soon!

name: Sort It!
description: A Virtual Reality psychology experiment developed by University of Oxford researchers.

name: Star Wars: Dark Forces Remaster
description:
Star Wars: Dark Forces Remaster will use Nightdive Studio’s proprietary KEX engine, support up to 4K resolution at 120FPS, feature modern gamepad support, remastered cutscenes, and add trophies and achievements to the original game experience.

Players assume the role of Kyle Katarn, a mercenary hired by the Rebel Alliance to discover and destroy the Galactic Empire’s Dark Trooper project, a clandestine military operation created to develop Force-sensitive stormtroopers and battle droids. Star Wars: Dark Forces features several memorable locations from the original trilogy, including the interior of a Star Destroyer and Jabba the Hutt’s desert yacht, as well as new locations unique to the game.

Star Wars: Dark Forces has enjoyed a sizable cult following in the decades since its original release, having been added to the Steam storefront back in 2009 and even being partially canonized in official Star Wars lore with the introduction of the Dark Troopers in the second season of The Mandalorian.

name: Linxy the Lynx
description: It's up to Linxy to Jump, Slide, Grind and Dash his way to Prof.B.Ray's Fortress to stop him in his tracks!

name: Gluua
description: first-person 1-4 multiplayer horror game. The game will allow players to take on the role of a spirit liberator who will be able to freely choose missions based on the difficulty and readiness they like or want to do. Players will encounter the supernatural and find the truth in that place.

name: Jump de Pon
description: Just keep climbing. Avoid falling rocks, climb cliffs and reach the goal. This game is a time attack type 3D action game that challenges you to reach the goal as fast as possible with simple controls.

name: Axon Hero
description: Help factories with their logistical problems. Creative puzzles!

name: TimeMelters
description: Prevent Doomsday AFTER it happened! Designed by the co-creator of Sang-Froid - Tales of Werewolves and featuring both a single-player and co-op campaign, TimeMelters is a strategy hero defense where you go back in time and fight alongside your past selves.

name: Cats Love Boxes
description: Help Fofiño and Lily to move the boxes around in this co-op puzzle adventure.

name: Spiritfall
description: Spiritfall is a fast-paced Action Roguelite inspired by Platform Fighters. Battle against a multitude of enemies using an ever-changing arsenal of divine powers.

name: Evering
description:
Evering is an adventure RPG with a turn-based combat system and pixel art style that tells an epic story through witty and funny dialogues with charismatic characters in a completely unique and very detailed world where time loops around in circles.

This is an era of peace and the world faces no danger but if this legend turns out to be true... our days could be numbered.

Evering is a love letter to nostalgia, a tribute to the games we grew up with, with a renewed look and feel, with no random encounters and accessibility options. You don’t want to fight? That’s okay, you can escape every combat with no punishment so you can follow the story at your pace.

The world of Evering is full of treasures, maestros and crystals to learn new skills and alchemy ingredients. There are secrets hidden in the last place you would imagine. Can you find them all?

name: Special Force Double Take
description: [SPECIAL FORCE DOUBLE TAKE] is an innovative 3rd-person battle-royale shooter from Dragonfly GF Co., Ltd. You must hunt cruel monsters, loot valuable items to get stronger, and protect yourself from relentless enemy players to become the last survivor in this unpredictable field.

name: Mega Quiz Gaming
description: Guess the classic and new trending games in the best quiz game with over 250 levels based on logic, deduction and your gaming knowledge.

name: Minigolf Blast
description: Minigolf Blast is a fun, whimsical, online multiplayer, hot-seat multiplayer and single player minigolf game. Easy to play. Lots of variety with 117 holes on 6 different courses. Designed and programmed by creator of Sierra's 3D Ultra Minigolf.

name: Atom RPG: Trudograd - TG Supporter Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Garfield+
description: 'Garfield+' is a mod of the 2004 PC game 'Garfield' developed by YouTuber kkclue that overhauls and refurbishes the game for modern palettes and devices. Changes include modern controller support, improved graphics, quality-of-life tweaks, bug fixes, and the removal of Odie.

name: Clay Knight
description:
Clay Knight is a souls-like boss rush game. Heavily inspired by Elden Ring and other souls games.
The game has only 2 boss fights, tho the second one is particularly difficult.

This game solely focuses on the souls-like combat system.

name: Nuclear Plant 2024
description: Nuclear Plant 2024 is a map of Doom: E1M2 but Reimagined!

name: Desires of a Dragon Prince
description:
You’ve been taught about dragons since birth without knowing your true bloodline until one day you’re whisked away to a different world—a world full of dragons that have their own set of rules and clans. You’re accompanied by three handsome princes who tell you that you’re the Lost Dragon Princess and must take your place on the throne if the Dragon World is ever going to see peace amongst themselves and humans again!

The path is treacherous as you and your princely companions struggle to unite the clans. It seems there’s another dark force at work that’s just waiting to see you fail. You wonder how you can unite the Four Clans when your princes can’t even seem to agree amongst themselves half of the time. Will you let the bickering over you keep you from your mission?

Find out in Desires of a Dragon Prince!

name: Spellarium 2
description: that's the Part 2 of our successfull Spellarium series. Our world consists of 6 elements: the Earth, Water,Fire,Light,Darkness and Water. So, we need to create the 7th element. The game has 110 Match 3 levels plus Solitaires, Spot the Difference and Hidden Objects scenes. Plus a nice town to build.

name: NeverGoingHome
description: Ready for a fast paced rogue-like action shooter with upgrades, abilities and loads of weapons?, well you found it!

name: Shashingo: Learn Japanese with Photography - Additional Camera Filters
description: This DLC gives you an additional pack of 6 Camera Filters to use while taking photos in Shashingo!

name: Spiderbro 2
description: Help Shadowbro overcome a computer worm come to life and save the multiverse from colliding! Collect items, talk to employees, solve puzzles and explore the secrets of a company that caused everything to happen!

name: The DeLuca Family: Season 1
description: The DeLuca Family is a story-driven adult game. Try to win over the ladies of the house and increase in the ranks in the crimeworld. Choose your playstyle with three modes - full experience (Text-based rpg game), story+freeroaming, or VN-Mode. But no matter the mode, lots of lewd!

name: Romance in the Cityscape
description: Tired of the everyday life of a small town, you decide to start a new life in Vine City. There you will have to develop relationships with girls, build your path to love and adventure, plunging into an exciting world of new opportunities!

name: Paranormal: Found Footage
description: You are a student journalist who decides to make a documentary about the abandoned «North» cosmodrome, where in the 1990s a series of man-made disasters occurred that caused serious genetic changes in humans and animals, forming previously unknown mutations.

name: Need for Speed Unbound: Vol.6 - Premium Speed Pass
description: The Vol. 6 Premium Speed Pass immediately grants the new Audi RS 6 Avant (2020) and opens up your access to its bodykits, along with 3 Rare Custom versions of the new Audis, and more.

name: Master Arena: Ultimate Pass
description: Discover the ultimate experience with our exclusive Battle Pass on Steam! Unlock 113 skins, including 100 exclusive weapon skins and 3 character skins. Customize your arsenal and stand out on the battlefield. Get your Battle Pass now!

name: For Ever Melancholia
description: An archaeology student is sent to do his summer training in a place far away from civilization. There he meets three beautiful girls who share his passion for cinema and art. What can possibly go wrong?

name: Gay Sex Adventures: Episode 5
description: An erotic VISUAL NOVEL featuring HD GRAPHICS and realistic-looking characters. Embark on Tony’s Sex Adventure as he rediscovers life as a single man. The story continues at the same Gay Resort, with Tony getting a full-body massage from the hot bartender.

name: Guragura Oden
description: Do you know the traditional Japanese dish "Oden"? This is a puzzle game in which you pile up ingredients in an earthenware pot that shakes unsteadily and unsteadily! Try to pile up ingredients until the pot loses its balance and collapses to get a high score!

name: Dominion: Cornucopia - 1st Edition
description: This 1st Edition pack requires owning the corresponding expansion to play. The 10 cards removed from Cornucopia when it went to its 2nd edition. These were removed for a reason! But if you want them anyway, here they are.

name: Battle Marine
description: SHOOT 'EM UP! Battle Marine is a simple naval barrage STG. A barrage of intense shots! Shoot 'em up! Shoot 'em up! Chain bombs with detonation, powerful laser sweeps, and jumps to collect medals! Enjoy a RETRO but NEW and exhilarating STG experience!

name: Northern Tales 6: Oath to the Gods - Collector's Edition
description: Ragnar the great Viking king continues his journey. Now he needs to return home after a long wandering. However, new adventures lie ahead. Who knows what new dangers may lie in wait for Ragnar and the party on the way to the house.

name: The Game Awards
description: THE GAME AWARDS invites you, the player, to a behind-the-scenes look at one wannabe indie darling's sordid tryst with game development. Learn what it takes to be an amateur, laugh at jokes, experience plot twists, and join our rookie dev on a rollercoaster ride that's rapidly running out of track.

name: World of Shooting: Lifetime Shooting Club Member
description: World of Shooting: Lifetime Shooting Club Member DLC gives several benefits: - access to the weapons marked with the bage Club Member Only - access to accessories marked with the bage Club Member Only

name: World of Shooting: Practical Shooting Campaign
description: World of Shooting: Practical Shooting Campaign has more than 80 stages for the pistol, shotgun and carbine, rifle, machine gun.

name: World of Shooting: Practical Shooting Arenas
description: World of Shooting: Practical Shooting Arenas contain 2 shooting ranges for Workshop.

name: World of Shooting: Killhouse 50m Hangar Arena
description: World of Shooting: Killhouse 50m Hangar Arena for Workshop.

name: Erentis, l'académie de magie
description: Un MMORPG 2D free-to-play dans un univers de fantasy avec des combats en tour par tour, des professions avec un gameplay uniques, des dialogues avec choix de réponses et bien d'autres fonctionnalités !

name: Train Sim World 4: Bahnstrecke Salzburg - Rosenheim Route Add-On
description: Go cross-border and shuttle along the rural backdrops of Europe in Train Sim World 4. Take a trip back to the early 2010s and climb aboard the classic BR 111 - tap into Deutsche Bahn regional services between Germany and Austria with Salzburg - Rosenheim!

name: Now Open! Horror House
description: This is a simulation management and tower defense type game where players take on the role of a "Horror House Owner". Using various mechanisms and props, players aim to scare off visitors who come to challenge the "Horror House", gradually expanding and strengthening the business.

name: Forza Horizon 5: European Automotive Car Pack
description: The European Automotive Car Pack showcases some of the best work of car manufacturers from Across the Atlantic. It includes the 1987 Mercedes-Benz AMG Hammer Wagon, 2021 Bentley Continental GT Convertible, 2020 Automobili Pininfarina Battista, and the 2019 Jaguar XE SV Project 8.

name: Grim Dawn: Steam Loyalist Items Pack 3
description: This collection of vanity items is themed around several of Grim Dawn's enigmatic deities. Whether you are an old fan or picking up the game for the first time, you can be sure to find an exceptional new look to conquer Cairn in style.

name: JR EAST Train Simulator: Takasaki Line (Ueno to Takasaki) E233-3000 series
description: The Takasaki Line is a 74.7 km long line connecting Omiya Station in Saitama City, Saitama Prefecture to Takasaki Station in Takasaki City, Gunma Prefecture. This DLC includes the Tohoku Main Line section between Ueno and Omiya stations, for a total length of 101.4 km.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Pro Train - SD40-2 Loco Bundle 2
description: The EMD SD40-2 is a 3,000-horsepower (2,200 kW) C-C diesel-electric locomotive built by EMD from 1972 to 1989. Featuring multiple custom scripted features, PBR textures, and more, this pack includes ATSF Santa Fe, BC Rail, Conrail, Canadian National, and NS Maersk Sealand locos.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Pro Train - SD40-2 Loco Bundle 2
description: The EMD SD40-2 is a 3,000-horsepower (2,200 kW) C-C diesel-electric locomotive built by EMD from 1972 to 1989. Featuring multiple custom scripted features, PBR textures, and more, this pack includes ATSF Santa Fe, BC Rail, Conrail, Canadian National, and NS Maersk Sealand locos.

name: Trainz Plus: Pro Train - SD40-2 Loco Bundle 2
description: The EMD SD40-2 is a 3,000-horsepower (2,200 kW) C-C diesel-electric locomotive built by EMD from 1972 to 1989. Featuring multiple custom scripted features, PBR textures, and more, this pack includes ATSF Santa Fe, BC Rail, Conrail, Canadian National, and NS Maersk Sealand locos.

name: Sword Princess Sistina
description: Since a young age, Sistina has been lauded as the Sword Princess thanks to her masterful bladework. When the Demon God is accidentally unleashed, those skills are put to the test as she faces unstoppable adversaries!

name: Laser Sphere
description: An arcade game exclusively for the Playdate. This uses the crank to aim a giant laser across the screen at waves of enemies.

name: Super Icarus
description: Score points by flying close to the edge of the screen, but not too close! Colliding will drop mines & make things more difficult.

name: Puzzle Maker
description: “Puzzle Maker” is a puzzle game in which you can easily create your own puzzles, as well as play ready-made ones. To complicate or simplify the game, there are customization settings - the number, shapes and boundaries of puzzle pieces.

name: Exit Kun: Play Together
description: Experience the fun of Kunkun with your friends! You can play online through local or Steam remote play.

name: Covejank
description:
We've reached a critical mass of boxes and they've gone wild! Should've secured a higher CPU budget.

Ninth in a series of short sokoban browser games by the developer of Baba Is You.

name: The Bunker
description: Go throughout an abandoned bunker with your friends collecting all the notepads. Beware of the zombies that lurk within.

name: The Witch of Fern Island: Wonderful Witch Pack
description: Obtain this fantastic Radiance Witch outfit to show off around the town! A beautiful chest will appear near the mailbox and contain a set of bourgeois furniture and wallpapers. This set of deluxe items will turn your cozy life into a new classy experience!

name: Hop Top
description:
Classic arcade action returns with a brand new look and feel!

The troublesome bugs of Insect Tower took Hop's wings! To get them back, you'll have to chase speedy Wasps and face three kinds of fearsome Flies through five floors of exciting shoot 'em up platforming action. It's up to you to help Hop the Dodo Bird as he hops to the top!

Watch out for tricks and traps, special score items, and even power-up platforms that'll help you turn the tide! Master each insect's specific patterns to score big and blow 'em away!

HOP TOP features 3 modes of play. In Campaign Mode, you'll guide Hop on his quest through the treacherous tower. In Endless Mode, you'll challenge countless waves of bugs and aim for the highest score! Finally, the Arcade Mode honors HOP TOP's arcade origins and shows what it could've been if it really was released back then.

Whichever mode you choose, pick-up-and-play fun awaits you.

name: One More Gate: Companion#3 DLC
description: Gon is a sweet little Dragoone but not so easy to tame! Naturally wary, Gon often changes color to blend into the environment. You'll have to be patient to tame those chameleon scales. It'll be worth the trouble, though!

name: One More Gate: Companion#2 DLC
description: Vivaldi's bark is all rhythm! The perfect all-season fighting companion. This little Trunknid was nearly firewood. The terrifying prospect resulted in completely wacky foliage! One day all's blooming, and the next all the branches are bare!

name: One More Gate: Companion#1 DLC
description: Incognito isn't just any Squirrol… This companion can sneak in anywhere! This fearless red-haired critter loves changing clothes: glasses, caps, fake moustaches… Prepare to be surprised at the stunning disguises!

name: Trudograd: Supporter Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Assetto Corsa Competizione: GT Racing Game Bundle
description:
GT Racing Game Bundle for Assetto Corsa Competizione.

Contents
Assetto Corsa Competizione Base Game.
ACC 2020GT World Challenge Pack
ACC British GT Pack:
ACC GT4 Pack:
ACC Intercontinental GT Pack:
ACC 2023 GT World Challenge Pack
ACC GT2 Pack:

name: Weedcraft Inc + Crossroads Inn: Weed and Greet Bundle
description: Build your own weed empire or create a fantasy tavern - Weedcraft Inc + Crossroads Inn

name: Weedcraft Inc + Ruinarch: Devil Lettuce Bundle
description: Become an evil overlord or create a marihuana empire - Ruinarch + Weedcraft Inc

name: Welcome to Paradize: Zombot Edition
description: Paradise isn't exactly what you hoped for: it's infested with zombies! Thankfully, you can control them. Capture them and teach them to farm or fight. They will help you defend your camp while you explore the world looking for… a new paradise.

name: Age of Wonders 4: Primal Fury
description: Harness the power of nature in the Age of Wonders 4: Primal Fury content pack. Channel the spirit of your favorite animal with the Primal culture, ride a mammoth or a crocodile into battle, and wield the powers of the Naga lords!

name: Atta: Spot the Oddities in the Strange Hotel
description: Welcome to Room 1028 of the Despair Hotel! An attraction where you search for mistakes in the supernatural space Even if you suffer injuries so severe that they might kill you, it's okay You'll wake up in Room 1028 as if nothing happened Please enjoy to your heart's content until you're satisfied

name: Poka-poka Mama Koi Onsen: Mommy's Warm Hot Sprint
description: "I'm the one who discovered the hot spring. Let's enjoy this together." Refresh your daily fatigue with a soothing hot spring!

name: Otherworld Apocalypse
description: The game is a fantasy-themed RPG telling the story of a teenage hexer saving an elven forest from a evil factory. The main character would go on a amazing journey in which he would encounter werewolves, vampiric alpors and other strange creatures.

name: Trollin el Corredor
description: A parody of a typical infinite runner, certain Wii U games and memes from the past decade! (Its a Meme Run fan remake)

name: Aqua Fry
description: Dive into chaotic underwater battles in Aqua Fry. Knock rivals into bubbles, outsmart the colossal Eye enemy, and hatch eggs to face an epic boss. Unique characters, strategic gameplay - the ultimate 2D, top down, local multiplayer frenzy!

name: Sandstorm Strike Force
description: Are you ready to answer the call of duty?

name: Gleylancer & Gynoug Combo Pack
description: ~ Gleylancer + Gynoug ~

name: Fist Food
description: One-button arcade score chaser. Grow and shrink your fist to combo your way to victory. Eat all insects as quickly as possible before the day runs out, otherwise it's game over.

name: Beat the Beats
description: An electric mix of rhythm and boxing game! Use actual boxing-style punches to pound your way through musical arcade levels in hypnotic VR. Get pumped, get moving and beat the beats!

name: Piczle Cross: Story of Seasons
description: Enjoy the bucolic charm of Story of Seasons while relaxing and exercising your brain with classic Piczle Cross nonogram logic-puzzles.

name: Simulator Of A Person Who Is Taking Online Course To Study How To Lose Weight
description: You will play as a person who is learning how to lose weight in an online course. And all you have to do is learn!

name: Curse Errant
description: After a fierce selection, the protagonist Giselle gloriously became a knight of the Mariolu family. But becoming a knight was just the beginning; Giselle's true mission was far more profound and complicated.

name: Dokkalfheim Magical University
description: University life has never been so magical! Recruit friends, complete story quests, upgrade your equipment and skills, decorate your dorm and so much more! This exciting saga will satiate your desires for witchy themes, turned based battles and side missions!!

name: Drop the Dice
description: Drop the Dice is a “Side Game” whose goal is to score as many points as possible by placing your dice on the board! Optimize the positioning to obtain similar totals on your rows and columns, increase your score, use bonuses and cross the different levels!

name: Run Pizza Run
description: Do you like challenges? Then this game is for you! Manage a delivery man and deliver all the pizzas to the address. But remember, it won't be easy. Good luck!

name: Delivery INC: Large Cargo
description: Expand your fleet with trucks and conquer the large cargo market. Pursue new lucrative contracts, hire delivery assistants, and enjoy a new campaign scenario taking place in Stockholm, Sweden. Large Cargo is coming!

name: Terror at Oakheart
description: The renowned slasher horror films of the 1980s and 1990s serve as a source of inspiration for Terror at Oakheart. The community of Oakheart has been terrorized by Teddy, a masked serial killer. As the body count rises, you discover there is more going on here than just a man in a mask killing helpless teenagers.

name: Slippy the Frog
description: Much like Slippy himself, this game is jam packed with mini games, cuteness, and gallons of juice.

name: The Witch's Cookbook
description: Concoct magical potions with or without the help of your community's chat. You'll experiment with different ingredients to create powerful spells, but beware - your viewers can add their own twists resulting in hilarious and unpredictable outcomes. Get ready for a chaotic and exciting experience!

name: Dicefolk
description: In this deck-building game, you play as a chimera summoner on an adventure to restore peace to your world! Explore unique biomes, recruit new chimeras, and build the perfect squad! Command your chimeras using unique dice mechanics to lead your squad to victory!

name: Code Zodiac
description: Fight for the future in this story-driven, fast-paced robot boss rush. Code Zodiac is a compact, single-player action game with a compelling sci-fi narrative. Slash, shoot, and dodge your way through robotic titans as you fight to save the world.

name: Street Fighter 6: Year 1 - Ed
description:
Ed is the third DLC character for Street Fighter 6 in the Year 1 Character/Ultimate Pass.

A Psycho Power-wielding youth aged up rapidly by Shadaloo's experimentation, on a journey and a mission to free other subjects. He gets his short temper and foul mouth from Balrog, his former mentor.

name: PowerWash Simulator: Warhammer 40,000 Content Pack
description: Clean up the Grim Darkness of the Far Future when Warhammer 40,000 comes to PowerWash Simulator. As humanity stands at the edge of what could be its darkest age, could you wash away the grime to reveal a brighter future?

name: Builders of Greece
description: Immerse yourself in the beautifully recreated golden age of Hellenic city-states. Builders of Greece is a city management game which lets you display your strategic and economic mastery.

name: The Witch of Fern Island
description: The Witch of Fern Island is a game about a young girl who wants to become a real witch. Immerse yourself in the history of the island and get to know its inhabitants. It's time to find your place in the world.

name: Metal Voyager
description: It's your one way ticket to midnight! A side-scrolling heavy metal guitar shooter. Blast your enemies with pure metal energy from your astral guitar as the backing track rages in the night. Featuring a fleet of surreal hand drawn space monsters and an arsenal of cosmic items to whomp them with.

name: Alone in the Crowd
description: Locked in a dark room filled with computers. A mysterious character helps you regain your lost memory in exchange for a few tasks. Without alternatives, you comply.

name: Shashingo: Learn Japanese With Photography
description: An edutainment game that teaches you Japanese through virtual photography. With your trusty camera, take photographs of the fictional streets of Japan to capture new words and images as fully translated flash cards!

name: Wrath: Aeon of Ruin
description: Blast, slice and shred through your enemies in this hardcore FPS inspired by the icons of the '90s, powered by the legendary Quake-1 Tech. Taking place in a realm left to rot, take up arms, unearth long-forgotten secrets and hunt down the Guardians of the Old World.

name: Dark Elf Historia
description: Dark Elf is an RPG from oneone1 that was released on August 3, 2017.

name: Super Mario Odyssey: Google Translated
description: Almost the entirety of Super Mario Odyssey has been run through multiple layers of Google Translate.

name: Sesari 1
description: Sesari 1 is the first part in a haunted science-fiction point-and-click adventure game series about two women suddenly and completely losing their memory at a gas station in the middle of the desert,

name: Cinematrix
description: For each square, select a movie that satisfies the two intersecting clues from the x-axis and y-axis. You have nine guesses to fill out the entire grid. A given movie cannot be used twice.

name: Chef Life: A Restaurant Simulator - Cooking Lab
description: Sin descripción

name: Flutter!
description: A level hack for Yoshi's Island containing 30 new stages.

name: The Land: Elf no Mori
description: Growing and harvesting vegetables and fruits becomes NFTs. It is a farming metaverse game.

name: Generality 4
description: This pack has a little bit of everything, although it's mostly focused on QoL features and basic tech mods. The main idea, much like the rest of the Generality series, is to feel like its own game, totally separate from Minecraft.

name: A Missing Salesman
description: A missing salesman - This is a short first-person horror game (psx/ps1). At first glance it may seem that the game is quite simple, but to understand its meaning you need to go through it carefully to the end. The game has a tense atmosphere, screemers and sharp sounds.

name: Sleepless in the Sapphire City
description: Sin descripción

name: Chess Opening Repertoire Builder
description: Learn chess openings and try them out against an AI instantly!

name: Sakura Isekai Adventure
description: Sakura Isekai Adventure is a yuri adventure story set in a fantasy world. Aki’s ordinary life is turned upside-down when she’s summoned to the magical land of Anthem by a cute cat-eared witch to find a missing priestess. Now what will she do?!

name: BattleField BattleFront
description: If I would categorize "BattleField BattleFront," it would be summarized as a RTSTD (real-time strategy tower defense) game.

name: Matexo
description: Sin descripción

name: Conversation With a Rock
description: Have a conversation with a rock in this comedic piece of interactive fiction.

name: Miaow.Emma
description: This is a point-and-click adventure game where you go on an adventure with the cat Emma! A well-structured and exciting adventure story organized by episode awaits you. Go on an adventure with Emma and uncover her secrets.

name: Dino Rush
description: Welcome to Dino Rush – the ultimate test of survival in a prehistoric world! Dodge and sprint your way through a relentless horde of dinosaurs as you strive to survive for as long as possible. Encounter a variety of dinosaurs, push your reflexes to the limit in this pulse-pounding action experience!

name: Flying Ferret
description: In this action game, a mysterious ferret with special jumping ability and its friends are made to jump and fly at high speed from island to island over the blue ocean to fly farther and farther.

name: Angelblood
description: Sin descripción

name: FunPlay School
description: A moderate horror game set in the FunPlay School where you will have to try to escape from all that nightmare, crossing rooms with puzzles from the easiest to the most difficult. Will you do it?

name: KovaaK's: Anime Pack
description: Enhance your aim training aesthetic with KovaaK's first cosmetic DLC, the Anime Pack. Personalize your experience with anime-inspired visuals while supporting the development team. Includes character skins, skies, props, and more, playable by all users, promoting community creativity.

name: NightClub Simulator
description: seduce girl or get into fight, you can do anythings in virtual night club that you can't do in real life.

name: Bunker's Shadow
description: The game is a First Person Shooter.In a huge dangerous underground, you need to save a little girl.Being lost in a huge bunker, the task is to survive and find the keys for the doors and find the way to the exit. An encounter with zombies and enemy soldiers is inevitable.

name: Macho Scooping
description: "Macho Scooping" Battle for Up to 4 Players! Compete to scoop as many cute and unique muscular specimens swimming in the tank as possible within the given time for an entertaining and adorable spectacle!

name: Nothing Together: Retro Console Theme
description: Enjoy doing Nothing while looking at a black background with neon green texts with the Retro Console Theme DLC!

name: Nothing Together: Dark Fire Theme
description: Enjoy doing Nothing while looking at a black background with neon red texts with the Dark Fire Theme DLC!

name: The Lost Village: Fantasy
description: The sky shattered, and a group of folks who called themselves adventurers fell into this world. Their personalities are quirky yet passionately fiery, seemingly always filled with curiosity and hope. Currently, these folks are exploring the entirety of the cultivation world.

name: Virtual Rides 3: Ride Pack
description: Get ready to elevate your virtual funfair experience with two exciting new rides: "Glider" and "Upside Down".

name: Hentai Golf: Extended Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: The Secret Atelier
description: You are the advisor of the art club and the only other person in there is Ichijou Erika. She offers to be a model for the club but your eyes begin to wander towards her erotic body. Something she is very aware of. How will you maintain your composure in front of her lascivious invitation?!

name: Alcatraz
description: I was surprised to end up in Alcatraz. Having the best lawyer, I had hoped to be acquitted. But all his efforts to get me acquitted were in vain. My sentence screamed: "Welcome to hell, son." And so I found myself among thieves, murderers and rapists.

name: 100 Robo Cats: Extra Content
description: By purchasing DLC, you will get extra content in the game 100 Robo Cats. Get an extra level with 100 more adorable cats!

name: 100 Dino Cats: Extra Content
description: By purchasing DLC, you will get extra content in the game 100 Dino Cats. Get an extra level with 100 more adorable cats!

name: This is Normal
description: An educational game that teaches about Self Managed Abortion.

name: Ultimator
description: Welcome to Ultimator: The Ultimate Reaction Challenge! Gear up for a gaming challenge that demands precision - Ultimator is not just a game; it's a thrilling adventure filled with relentless enemies, epic bosses, and non-stop action!

name: Use Turbo To
description: Maneuver with precision through a never-ending, difficulty increasing, and procedurally-generated barrage of stages. "Use Turbo To" bolt and ram through many dangerous encounters in this arcade score attack precision runner.

name: The World Is Really Right!
description: This is a game made of rpg maker mv! A classic jrpg! Bring together people with different world views and backgrounds and meet here! There are swords and magic, infinite magic, bullets and fire, all kinds of fancy things, science and technology, ancient and endless unknown things here!

name: The Projet Poulet
description: Help the brave chicken go through dozens of interesting puzzle levels where you must show wit and make timely decisions.

name: Hike Adventures
description: Embark on a leisurely journey through enchanting places of peace and discovery. Immerse yourself in the beauty of nature.

name: 101 Cats Hidden in Dubai
description: Find and discover 101 cute cats hidden throughout the Dubai landscape in this hand-drawn hidden object game. Can you find them all?

name: Spellstrife
description: Spell words to summon monsters in a turn-based battle system. Choose your upgrades carefully as you climb the Spelltower with a variety of classes in roguelike runs that last around an hour.

name: Gearbits: Gear Angels
description: 2D side-scrolling shoot 'em up

name: Pocket Fishing
description: Dive into a Relaxing and Thrilling Fishing Adventure!

name: Moo Moo: Liar's Dice
description: The ultimate Liar's Dice multiplayer experience

name: 100 Robo Cats
description: Join the cutest adventure in the Robot-themed location with Cats and Robots! Explore the charming hand-drawn artwork of robo location and robo-cats as you embark on a quest to find 100 adorable cats hidden throughout the game. Can you find them all?

name: Cats and Seek: Dino Park
