description: John and Emily are on a date to Dino Park. Turns out, not only are there lots of dinosaurs, but there are also many cats playing and hiding there ! Let's play hide and seek with the cats in Dino Park! Can you find them all?

name: 100 Dino Cats
description: Join the cutest adventure in the Dino park with Cats and Dinos! Explore the charming hand-drawn artwork of dinosaurs location and dino-cats as you embark on a quest to find 100 adorable cats hidden throughout the game. Can you find them all?

name: Danger Ramps
description: Danger Ramps is a 3D platformer driving game. Master the control of your vehicle to advance through colorful environments, collecting stars without flipping over or falling into abysses.

name: RYBot
description: Revitalize a world of machines across multiple islands in this captivating puzzler. Unlock new mechanics in 50 levels, blending strategy and color theory. Get ready for an electrifying color adventure!

name: Tunguska: Slaughterhouse
description: A wave defense mode set in a new location in Tunguska. Stop the waves of minions from energizing the Dark Disciple and destroying the Zone. Arm and supply yourself with Soul Stones left by your fallen foes. Use your creativity with all the gears in the game to outgun a seemingly undefeatable enemy.

name: Boons & Burdens
description: Boons & Burdens is a single player action-roguelike set in the depths of hell. Battle hordes of demons through 13 levels, collect gems to purchase powerful boons, and choose from deadly burdens that alter the game's difficulty. Will you be the paragon of power or the architect of your own defeat?

name: Whispers of the Citadel
description: Immerse yourself in a kingdom's turmoil. Love, power, and destiny intertwine as you, a valiant soldier gifted with the citadel, navigate a precarious path to the throne. With the king's demise and no heir in sight, you must find a bride in just one month. Choose from five captivating partners.

name: Nightmare Labyrinth
description: Nightmare Labyrinth is an asymmetric VR game where a VR player must navigate a dark maze while avoiding a terrifying creature controlled by a desktop player. Scare your friends in this unique VR/First person experience!

name: Luna's Light
description: Luna's Light is the story of a young huntress who must leave her village and face a cruel post-apoclyptic world. Explore various biomes, find upgrades, fight bosses and complete quests.

name: Dragon Kings
description: Dragon Kings is a top down action rogue-lite shooter. Power up weapons and drones and annihilate hoards of dragons and dinosaurs.

name: The Sweetest Ring
description: The Sweetest Ring is a short linear NTR visual novel about meeting and dating a ghost woman until she discovers there is better dick to be found by crawling back into the very TV she came from and joining the professional porn stars inside!

name: Arena 9th
description: Welcome to the AUTO-CARD Competition of The Ninth Universe. You can show your skills, enter a higher level of competition, and strive to win the glory of the universe championship.

name: Angry Mother Earth
description: In "Angry Mother Earth", step into the shoes of Mother Earth and her alternate forms: Father Earth, Midgard, and Gaia. Each offers distinct abilities and introduces diverse strategies to the gameplay.

name: Psycholog
description: As a psychologist, manage your clients' phobias while confronting a serial killer. This horror game blends dialogue in the style of a visual novel with first-person point-and-click elements.

name: Technocide
description: Technocide is a vertical scrolling shoot 'em up with a heavy emphasis on player weapons and abilities. You must not let enemies past you and reach your mothership! You will need quick tactical thinking as you weigh your weapons' strengths and weaknesses against your enemies and their positioning.

name: Rock Star Life Simulator
description: Rock Star Life Simulator is an extensive fame simulation game. Start this adventure by playing the guitar on the street, form your own band. Protect the fame, money, and charisma you earned with the right decisions and become a world star!

name: There's No Dinosaurs
description: There's No Dinosaurs is a hidden object game with a selection of 9 locations and random dinosaurs to find for each of them.

name: Qyllscape
description: Qyllscape (verb): The act of an author becoming a traveler in another world.

name: Ultra Foodmess 2
description: Pack your bags and grab your passport! You and your friends are going on a tasty trip around the world filled with chaos and laughter! Your favorite food characters are back in an even more epic and fun competition (now with a DASH action!)

name: Primitive Society Simulator
description: In this game, you'll be the leader of an ancient tribe, guiding your people to explore the natural world, to hunt, and to farm. As culture and civilization prosper, you shall establish a tribal alliance, a community with a shared future of tribes.

name: William and Sly
description: An open-world 3D platformer based on the popular William and Sly flash games. Explore a wild mountain landscape in search of mushrooms and untangle the magical machinations of a dark enchantress. Features fifteen new songs and over ten hours of gameplay!

name: Zeta Leporis RTS
description: A sci-fi real-time strategy game. An existential war among asteroids in classic RTS style. Build and defend, produce and upgrade, attack and annihilate!

name: Towerspell
description: Scrabble meets Plants Vs. Zombies! Spell words to summon monsters or cast spells in a tactically deep battle system. Fight through 50+ handmade levels in the story mode, battle your friends in online 1-on-1 PvP matches, or create and share your own levels.

name: Gods Against Machines
description: You are a god born of necessity. Your world is under attack by a ruthless race of machines, and you are its only hope. Create an arsenal of powerful spells and eliminate the enemy before they irrevocably poison your home in this roguelike strategy game!

name: Starlight and the Silver Key
description: Starlight and the Silver Key is a strange puzzle game about saving the world after your own world falls apart. Solve puzzles. Whisper passwords into ears. Make something called a Greasy Joe and become best buds with a demon.

name: Cursed Crew
description: Cursed crew is a roguelike crew management game taking place on a 18th century ship in a fantasy setting. You control a captain that needs to keep the ship’s crew alive in a harsh world with environmental hazards, pirates, sea monsters and much, much more. Can you lift off the Curse?

name: Ex Astris
description: Ex Astris reveals an exploration of episodic narrative and 3D RPG gameplay.

name: Camp Canyonwood
description: Build and manage the summer camp of your dreams in Camp Canyonwood. A life sim about the great outdoors, childhood memories, and the things that go bump in the night.

name: Pull Stay
description: Pull Stay is a wacky Beat 'em up game with Tower Defense mechanics. Use your fists or set crazy traps to repel enemies from rushing into your house! Defend your buddy Susumu, who goes out of his house only once in every two months for his haircut!

name: Milon's Secret Hell
description: Join Milon as he dies and goes to Hell! Pure arcade fun, meet four cruel gods, and discover five secret rooms. A fanmade sequel to Milon's Secret Castle.

name: Bonded in Darkness
description:
Arnaud just wants to be left alone.

Turned into a vampire against his will long ago, he's nonetheless managed to carve out a largely peaceful existence in an abandoned manor—a peaceful existence routinely interrupted by the vampire hunter Julien, seeking blood for blood.

Over the years, animosity has morphed into a strange sort of respect, and on one stormy night, Arnaud is greeted with a sight he never expected: his mortal enemy Julien, gravely injured on his doorstep.

Will Arnaud take him in, or will he use this opportunity to grasp the peace he's been seeking for years?

name: Silver Falls: Battle Fever - Galaxy Bound Curse
description:
An action beat em up game in the Silver Falls universe!

Play as Fred Hardluck in the world of Galaxy Bound Curse from the Nintendo GameBoy. Find a variety of weapons and defeat as many enemies as you can to earn a high score. Have YOU got... Battle Fever!?

name: Inamorata
description:
Ever wanted a hot vampire girlfriend, but you’re too asexual for your own good?

Play as Ronnie, the swoon-worthy, buff heroine of this comfy, cozy visual novel, and see if you can win over the stylish and beautiful Cece.

name: Blessed Agony
description: Blood opens the way...

name: Minesweeper Twist
description: A variant of the classic game Minesweeper on an irregular grid, where each tile can have between 6 and 10 neighbors, leading to more challenging and mind-bending levels.

name: Dead Names
description: A small sci-fi visual novel for Game Boy -- set during one winter day, in a future that hopefully never comes.

name: Daiku no Medium Megumi
description: This small game was made right soon after Daiku no Medium back in 2019 to show its ending from a different point of view.

name: The Murder of Dale Decker
description: Use your keyboard to uncover objects located at the crime scene. Guess words by typing to recall the space around you, uncover clues and solve the murder!

name: Pony World: Color by Numbers & Animal Golf: Battle Race Bundle
description:
Color your way through the enchanting Pony World!
+
Cute animal golf battle race game!

name: Swordfight Story
description: Samurai 3 DMMO action game.

name: The Need to Live
description:
A manor in the countryside stands resolute against the elements, protecting its occupants rain or shine.

Henri and Julien, its vampiric occupants, aren't weathering so well, however.

Centuries of life has left one numb and the other with crushing guilt.

When Adeline arrives mysteriously on their front step, it's up to her to find a middle ground while navigating her own set of challenges.

name: Kings Odyssey: Rise of The Necromancer
description: Seize your crown and forge your legacy in the siege against the shadows — where the fate of Ravenglade lies in your hands.

name: Lion Simulator Survival: RPG Animal Battle
description: Roar through the savannah, hunt prey, and lead your pride in Lion Simulator Survival—an immersive RPG animal battle experience.

name: Descent of the Hunted
description: You are a monster. You’re fresh on the trail of new prey, an isolated wretch vulnerable to your influence. But how will you stalk her? A long pursuit? A slow, parasitic feeding? A devastating ambush? In this psychological horror VN, you determine the manifestation of the beast under your control.

name: Cozy Island Idle
description: Cozy Island Idle is a cute and relaxing idle game where you catch all sort of fantasy fishes to showcase them in an Aquarium. You can sell them to turn a profit and customize your island.

name: Spark vs. The Marshmallows
description: 4 Player Plug-and-Play co-op/solo adventure. MUSICAL BOSS FIGHTS! LEVEL PROGRESSION! Unlockable abilities. A SWING ability. This is Spark, where you play as a tiny flame to fight through varieties of Marshmallow enemies to save your fellow flames!

name: IT Clicker: Dinosaur in the Code World
description: Welcome to the thrilling world of the IT industry! In our game, "IT Clicker: Dinosaur in the Code World," anyone can try their hand at being an IT whiz. We'll show you just how easy and fun it is to make money in the world of IT.

name: Animarama
description: Animarama - is a humorous interactive puzzle game in which you have to help the characters in the game solve their problems. To complete all the levels you will need the following skills: logic, physics, mathematics, humor and a little imagination. Will you be able to?

name: Dead Space Nokia
description: Dead Space demake for the Nokia! Experience the classic action survival horror through a tiny, mono-audio, 2 colored screen!

name: Vesperal Times
description: Sin descripción

name: BeHop Ranger And The Spicy Wizards
description: A remix of a remix of a remix in moonlight!

name: Japan Taxi Simulator
description: Sin descripción

name: Sprite Wars
description: Sprite Wars is a top-down arena shooter roguelite. Use, develop and purchase any of 8 unique weapons and 4 different skills. Fight bosses and show your enemies who the real boss is at the end of 40 levels.

name: Spy-der Pig
description: This is Obstacle game. Agent Spy-der Pig with the mission of destroying the most powerful thing in the dark world. The higher you go, there will be more obstacles and challenges. Let's fight together with Mr.derPig to see who will get to the best position in this journey.

name: Puzzle Art Gallery: Nature
description: An artistic puzzle game inspired by paper cutting art. Piece together fragments of paper cutouts to restore the nature-themed artworks in the gallery.

name: Light and Shadow: Schatten über Empyria
description: Meet new companions, regain your memory after a stranding, join a story guild, save the world from the shadow, or plunge it into ruin.

name: Just Skill Shooter 3: 2D Edition
description: Try on the role of a shooter who opposes the whole world

name: Crowd Control VR
description: Challenge your observation skills in the immersive world of ancient Greece! Identify impostors amid diverse crowds across 25+ unique levels. Designed for accessibility, even VR newcomers can enjoy the thrill. Uncover impostors and dominate the crowds in Crowd Control VR!

name: Sex Magic
description: Sex Magic is a captivating visual novel that immerses you in a world of magic

name: Nathan Morgan: Dilemma
description: Nathan Morgan: Dilemma is a single-player detective game. Detective Nathan Morgan, stationed in the state, is assigned to follow the trail of the mysterious murder at the Bennett mansion. Our goal is to find the killer by making use of the clues.

name: Tank Maze
description: In terms of visuals, sound effects, and user experience,

name: Papercut Art Gallery: Nature
description: Welcome to "Paper Art Gallery," an artistic puzzle game inspired by the art of paper cutting. Your task is to piece together fragments of paper cutouts to restore the nature-themed artworks in the gallery.

name: PolyDestroyer
description: Engage in cosmic battles with PolyDestroyer, a riveting 2D shooter. Navigate space, customize your ship, and thwart alien foes to save the galaxy. Your spacecraft, your adventure!

name: Tech Disorder
description: "Tech Disorder" merges turn-based strategy, Roguelike elements & deckbuilding in a cyberpunk world. Outwit foes with tactical plays and card combos.

name: Path to the Creator
description: A Text-Based Strategy RPG that features skills, classes, multiple game modes, crafting and more!

name: Tower Of Wishes 3: Japan
description: Tower of Wishes 3: Japan is a match 3 game that tells the story of Ryu, a skilled ninja who is on the run, being pursued by his own clan. Unable to shake off the relentless pursuit, Ryu decides to seek his destiny in climbing the Tower Of Wishes.

name: Twisty Pals
description: Twist and spin really fast!

name: Suika Game Bundle: Main Game & Multi-Player Mode
description:
Aim for a high score by combining two fruits of the same type to make a "sinker" to form a watermelon.

This set includes the main suika game and the new "2-player mode".

name: Grand Theft Houso
description:
Sleek crime requires a sharp mind. There are only a few pieces of the puzzle standing between you and a wad of cash.

Miniature puzzle heist made in flickgame.

name: Feathered Escape
description: Soar to freedom in Feathered Escape, a platformer where you, as a trapped bird, navigate challenging environments, overcoming obstacles and adversaries to reclaim the open skies.

name: Tipsy Rescue
description: Take your tipsy friend to go home!

name: Astro Miner: Moon Landing
description: Sin descripción

name: Dessert DIY: Premium Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: The Bike: Moto Ride Simulator
description: Rev up your adventure.Experience the thrill of the open road in the ultimate motorcycle escapade.

name: Slime Drop
description: A cute Suika type game but with slimes.

name: Kings Odyssey: Dwarves Tale
description: Unearth the secrets of the deep and forge your legacy in 'King's Odyssey: Dwarves' Tale,' where every hammer strike tells a story of bravery and brotherhood.

name: Capital Fire
description: An action RPG that combines exploration with dynamic combat. Estrela is a young defender of democracy who searches for the Book of the Greater Law to put an end to a terrible threat from patriotic zombies.

name: Blood On The Streets
description: Stepping into this open city, you will find a game world full of challenges and opportunities waiting for you to explore. In this free and open realm, engage in fierce gang wars with gangsters and mafia, challenging your strategy and leadership. Get ready to start a new life

name: Snap Together: New Challenges
description:
Prepare for New Challenges in Snap Together!
Boost the fun levels with your friends! Now we have 54 more exciting levels for you to showcase your skills.

No more boredom – just a thrilling time together! Dive into the Snap Together with a new DLC and feel the excitement of competition. Are you ready for new challenges?

Let the game begin!

name: Snap Together: New Challenges
description:
Solve a dozen of puzzles with your friends in Snap Together and have more with New Challenges!
Snap Together is a puzzle party game for up to 4 people on a single console! Assemble models with your friends or by yourself.

Play with your friends in Multiplayer mode and solve puzzles together or challenge them in Tournament mode.

In Tournament mode, there is only one winner! Use power-ups to mess up other players and win.

name: Hoofobia
description: Hoofobia is the multiplayer deer VS hunter PVP. When playing as deer, use stealth & strategy to sneak around vast forests and attack the lone hunter in order to escape his proximity without becoming a wall decoration.

name: Ewe Shall Not Pass
description: Ewe Shall Not Pass is a cozy farming action-roguelike adventure. Play as Shmandalf the wizard and herd your sheep through lands unknown, fighting off hordes of enemies with magic while upgrading your spells and growing your flock.

name: Dakkan! Monster no Shima
description: Sin descripción

name: HaHa
description: Our heroes are trapped in the universe of cartoon characters. This has not pleased the inhabitants. The creatures that have been living on their own for a long time certainly wouldn't want any visitors. Let's see if our heroes can escape from these unhappy hosts?

name: Dictator-chan island
description: A military man who, drunk, signed up for an impossible task. So skillfully avoids dirty and hard work that he did not even learn how to shoot for all the time he served in the army. A lover of parties and girls seems to have gotten into trouble this time. But he's a good guy, help him get out.

name: Runr End
description: Runr End is a challenging FPP-Platformer set in a dreamish world with secrets to discover. Be careful, don't be another fallen soul.

name: Suboptimal
description: Suboptimal is a small horror Point & Click adventure game where you must escape the submarine you are commanding, one way or another...

name: Death Is A Guest
description:
Your story starts when your best friend gives you an invitation to her boss' luxury Halloween party. Excited to meet new people and enjoy a few drinks, you plan to make this night unforgettable. However, everything changes when a dead body appears in the main hall.

Dreams become nightmares. Friends turn into hunters. The prince is now a monster.

Playing the role of detective in a horror movie, you now have no choice but to fight for your life.

The season of treats and tricks has arrived. It's time to get your costumes out of your wardrobe and party, as your life depends on it!

Dance, flirt, and solve a mystery. But do it all before the night ends.

name: Liquidum: Small & Tricky
description: A new level pack with 10 levels for Liquidum, a water-themed logic puzzle game.

name: Judge of Hasoon
description: It's a mystery game in which a story is told through options. Play the game in a beautiful dot background.

name: Icy Incline
description: "Icy Incline" is a experience where you control a penguin sliding through 24 icy trails. Race against time, avoid obstacles, and find the best route for the fastest time and reach the end of each trail. See your performance with stats like best score, worst score, and crashes.

name: Legend of Mushroom
description: Legend of Mushroom is a nurturing, leave-it-there game.It is the hottest and most popular game of the moment with 30 million downloads worldwide.It is also well known through advertisements on X and youtube.There is pvp, of course, gvg, and even fights between servers, and there is a lot of interaction through the chat function.Thank you for your consideration.

name: Bunny-girl with Golden Tummy
description: What could be cuter than a girl bunny? That's right! A girl bunny with a golden tummy! Our bunny loves to serve customers, she is just waiting to be asked to make a cocktail or dance. Don't keep her waiting and ask for something too! ♡

name: Project Rose
description: The heroine is framed to become a death row inmate. However, a mysterious organization that searches for beautiful death row inmates gives her a new identity, in exchange for her working for the organization. In order to prevent escape, she was put on electronic leg irons and started a new life...

name: Sweet Bitter
description: "Sweet Bitter" is a visual novel for adults only. A young boy named Phoenix, fleeing a painful past, finds himself a neighbor of two mysterious women: seductive Charlotte and her turbulent daughter Kira.

name: Jinni: Haunted House
description: Can you escape this haunted house? Or will you become a hostage of the mysterious creatures? It's up to you! Find your way out of the haunted house and save your life!

name: Angry stone
description: The mischievous little flying dragon accidentally entered the maze.

name: Pinbot
description: Pinbot reimagines the timeless breakout game in an immersive 3D setting. Traditional brick formations now morph into incubators nurturing alien robots, demanding swift destruction! In this robotic realm, every element is mechanized.

name: Hexceed: Rubrum
description: This DLC unlocks a brand new world for hexceed: Rubrum Puzzle your way through 140 new levels - levels include all previously introduced mechanics!

name: Hexceed: Year 4 Pass
description: This is your pass to 6 exciting new worlds to complete in hexceed! With 700+ levels to complete!

name: Dreamboat
description: This is a wonderful game!

name: BDSM Sex: Episode 2
description: A visual novel series about a young woman exploring the world of BDSM: in this episode, she continues her journey.

name: UT Adventure
description: UT Adventure is a promotional game by Uniqlo made as a part of their Capcom 40th anniversary line. The game was released for mobile browsers, alongside a physical arcade machine for a limited time event at Uniqlo Harajuku and a mini-arcade version that's being released as a part of a giveaway for the event (25-MAR-2024 - 21-APR-2024).

name: The Curse of Unatxi Kamala
description: Unatxi was thrilled to finally visit Glastonbury, the witchcraft capital of the UK. However, she did not anticipate the fateful encounter that would change her life forever.

name: Train Simulator: Rudolfsbahn: Bruck an der Mur - Selzthal & Knittelfeld
description: Head to scenic central Austria with Rudolfsbahn from RSSLO.

name: Mercuralia
description: In your search for a rare bird, you are caught in the tide of a mysterious ritual, a festival of living statues, and the ruins of an ancient floating city. Mercuralia is a mix of first-person exploration with visual novel elements.

name: Jigsaw Puzzle World: Bears
description: Add 20 new puzzles to your Jigsaw Puzzle World game.

name: Hospital of the Undead
description: You must escape a hospital overrun by zombies. Shoot your enemies and avoid the dark to preserve your sanity while managing your limited resources.

name: Maya Prophecy
description: Challenge numerous high-difficulty bosses and achieve victory through tactical planning and character growth. Success or failure depends on your strategy. Can you save the world?

name: Skulls of Olympus
description: Skulls of Olympus is an action RPG where you collect Gods from Greek Mythology to battle across dozens of worlds.

name: Cherno
description: Escape game where it is necessary to collect the clues to obtain the key and thus level up until you leave the building without being touched by the Russian experiments that seek to devour you. Show your ingenuity to look for clues in the dark and your agility to dodge the experiments' attacks.

name: Mika's Battle S
description: Mika's Battle S is a 2D platform action game based on the story of a warrior who has been commanded to defend Sunshineland territory against the attacks from the enemy soldiers belonging to the Rogho Corporation.

name: Eternal Burden
description: A puzzle platformer in which you play as William, a restless soul trying to go back in time to get rid of his burdens, symbolized by a metal ball chained to his body. Use the ball to your advantage to get over obstacles and to solve the physics based puzzles that block your path to liberation.

name: Save Giant Girl From Monsters 4
description: A flight simulator game. Save the giant girl from the monsters attacking her using a helicopter.

name: Escape from Bytesville
description: Action platformer game hiding a sinister secret!

name: Kitt's Quest
description: A puzzle/adventure platformer with thrilling boss fights. Find hidden items to increase your power, unlock new costumes and more!

name: Bod-1
description: BOD-1 is a thrilling horror movie set in the midst of a supernatural nightmare. After a long day at work, the protagonist returns home and discovers that his apartment has turned into a sinister place filled with otherworldly powers.

name: Marzia Lost In Space
description: A short linear story about a girl who has gotten herself stuck in space! Will she survive in the end or will it be her end?

name: God's Plan
description: Dive into a chilling adventure where horror meets imagination in this first-person thriller. Picture yourself in a maze of puzzles, where the story unfolds based on how you see it. It's not just a game; it's your own twisted journey.

name: Beyond the Breach
description: Discover a world overrun with robots, and play as a defective bot who tries to find a way to flee the facility. Find others who are the same kind, free them, and escape the laboratory!

name: Last of the Noticers
description: The time for noticing is over and the time for action is now. Carry out your master-plan that involves guns, explosives and computer duster or face integration into the tedium of industrial society. What will your social credit score be when your choices come to pass and the dust has settled?

name: Eugenia's Pursuit: The Hidden Legacy
description: Chairman Choi of OHJIN left $20 million just before his death. And Eugenia, who is aiming for that legacy. Her goal is to safely take the $20 million by ascending to the rooftop of OHJIN's abandoned building. And to uncover the hidden truth of OHJIN.

name: Play'te Spinna
description: A small score chaser using the crank to keep the increasing number of plates spinning for as long as possible.

name: Tap Drift Car
description: Here, you will become a drifting expert, challenging various tracks and enjoying the thrilling moments of turning. Very simple operation, but endless driving pleasure. You can also collect various cars and experience the unique handling of each one.

name: The Lands of Hyberian
description: Welcome to The Lands of Hyberian. The kingdom of Tydrall is ruled by the king and queen who have claimed all The Lands of Hyberian. It is up to the brave knights of Tydrall to answer the kings summon! Prepare your training and bring your wisdom as the king seeks an audience with you.

name: The Implant
description: This is my first relatively big game. You are the brain of a huge narketing company that helps their clients to achieve their sales goals. And you do it in a creative way creating newsbreaks, opinion leaders and shows. Simulating life as you see it should be. And it works because of the implant plan

name: Yomi 2: Renegades
description: Includes two new characters (Troq and River), two new gems (Orange and Diamond), and the ability to play any of the unlockable "wacky rulesets" from Career Mode in online friend matches.

name: The 257th Element
description: In 2032, Tokyo scientists unveil Araraginium, the 257th element, capable of materializing matter and bringing back the deceased as Araragi Humans. Masakazu Tokimune, a Japanese high school student, grapples with daily life's blend of humor, intrigue, and love.

name: Shockwaves
description: Shockwaves is a captivating merging puzzle game where strategic placement creates powerful shockwaves, pushing and merging numbers. Challenge yourself with endless scoring or solve intricate puzzles.

name: That's Not My Neighbor
description: 'That's not my Neighbor' is a 2D Indie horror game based on the job simulator genre with an unique twist created by Nacho Sama.

name: Time Fissure
description: "Time Fissure" is an 3D platformer combining action, puzzles, and unique time control. Explore different time spaces in a mysterious town, overcoming challenges and revealing secrets. Use the time slingshot to manipulate object flows, unlock levels, defeat enemies, and unravel the story.

name: HSNU
description: This is an online game about the scene of the High School Affiliated to the Normal University. The game currently only has the function of visiting the campus (you can currently see a few monsters on the campus)

name: Quick Golf
description: Swing into Adventure: Golf Like a Pro!

name: Alwa's Legacy + Alwa's Awakening
description: The Alwa’s Collection Bundle is the perfect set of games for anyone who enjoys classic gaming in the form of metroidvania adventure platforming games.

name: Woodturning 3D: Arts & Crafts
description: Sin descripción

name: Suika Watermelon Fruits
description: In this game, you merge two tiny fruits to increase their size and eventually form giant watermelons.

name: Call of Honor: Duty of Warfare
description: Answer the Call, Honor your Duty, and Dive into Tactical Warfare. Navigate Intense 5v5 Skirmishes, Decimate Your Foes, and Uncover the True Duty of Warfare!

name: Garten of Banban: Punchrush
description:
Official Garten of Banban: Punchrush!
Punch your way through Banban's Kindergarten while playing with all the characters!

name: Ghouls Of Divinity
description: Command a ghoul civilization with an innovative physics-based RTS system, complex AI interactions, and a rich skill tree. Strategy meets divinity in an immersive god game experience.

name: Woodturning 3D
description: Carve your way to brilliance! Unleash your inner carpenter and shape incredible wooden sculptures!

name: King's Odyssey
description: Ascend the throne and weave your tale of magic, power, and intrigue where your royal decree shapes the destiny of a kingdom.

name: Roofcats Band: Suika Style
description: What do cats do on the roof? They play jazz, rock, metal and more! In this Suika-like game, you must match the cats to make new musicians appear, all while avoiding overflow and dealing with a crazy dog that shows up to mess things up. Will you be able to hear a killer guitar solo on the last cat?

name: Thome Wake
description: An indie horror first-person game where you are in control of a streamer who learns from his viewers about Pisadeira, a demon/monster from Brazilian folklore. In disbelief, when he sleeps, Pisadeira doesn't allow him to wake up, leaving him stuck in his nightmare, and he has to figure out a way to leave, and finally wake up

name: Hoversteppers: Zone 1
description: Hoversteppers is a freestyle hoverboard skating game. Flip, spin, and test your boarding skills with timed challenges across multiple stages.

name: Truck Sim 2024
description: In Truck Sim 2024, players are thrust into the driver's seat of their own destiny. With a plethora of missions awaiting completion, from delivering crucial cargo to overcoming treacherous obstacles, every journey presents new opportunities and challenges. Whether it's hauling precious goods across long distances or tackling time-sensitive deliveries, the road ahead is yours to conquer.

name: Trash Punk: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: I Commissioned Some Mice 2
description: I paid more artists to hide mice and cheese in 15 pieces of artwork. Can you find them all? Warning: Relaxing.

name: Gunstorm
description: Gunstorm is a space shooter loaded with playability. Wave after wave of alien craft attack your agile ship. Use the mouse to control your ship at the speed of thought in a perfectly balanced game that starts easy and gradually gets more difficult.

name: Time Warp Infinite
description: Time Warp Infinite is a wild platforming couch party game for 1 to 4 players! Run and jump to kick your opponents off-screen in chaotic 10-second rounds, featuring a vast choice of stages and modifiers, or beat the clock in a huge single-player speedrunning campaign!

name: The Femboy Next Door Thinks I'm Cute
description: Coming home on a Saturday from the grocery store with little expectations, your roommate informs you that the femboy next door was looking for you...

name: The Rabbit and Tamaki are Taking a Break!
description: The rabbit and Tamaki are Taking a break! is a visual-novel game where a rabbit girl and various characters spend time together.

name: Project Ictos
description: Avoid everything, touch nothing, and reach a screen edge!

name: The jump guys
description: A physics-based platformer. 40 levels to pass. 12 fight arenas. Play with friends by local multiplayer or online multiplayer for up to 4 players

name: A Bots Color Adventure
description: Collect orbs, defeat enemies, and explore colorful worlds.

name: Dino Race: Dinosaur Ride Ranch
description: Unleash the Jurassic speed, conquer challenges, and race to triumph in this epic, adrenaline-fueled adventure.

name: A Fascinating Story: Wedding Night
description: This is a very simple card flip game where you turn over a card and then try to find another matching card. You only need to click on the card to find the same card as the image that appears, and the identical ones will be eliminated.

name: Mr. Run & Jump + Kombinera Adrenaline
description: Features 2 characterful games with beautifully illustrated visual aesthetics bursting with vibrant and approachable graphics. Both titles have a wide variety of puzzles and platforming adventures, as well as challenging levels, collectibles, and additional game modes.

name: Night Runners
description:
Night-Runners is a PC street racing game heavily influenced by 1990s-2009 car culture, with some RPG elements.

The game has semi realistic Simcade driving style. oil temp/water temp etc matter if you're planning on using NOS and don't want to blow your engine!

name: Altitude's Toll
description: Altitude's Toll is a short walking simulator mystery set in Himalayas. Deliver packages as sherpa and uncover possibly the biggest Himalayan secret in history.

name: Girls of the Tower
description: This is a Rogue-like game with a combination of JRPG, auto chess, and galgame elements. Players can choose from two different female protagonists to embark on a unique adventure. Additionally, players can recruit followers, strategize their formations, and develop their town!

name: Urban Chase
description: "Urban Chase" immerses players in a lively city chase between police and mischievous thieves. In this whimsical world, players take on the role of a police officer, engaging in thrilling pursuits to apprehend playful troublemakers.

name: Cocked and Loaded
description: Cocked and Loaded is a fast paced local multiplayer party game for up to four players. With simple controls, players will learn to shoot, melee, and dodge incoming attacks effectively within the first few matches. More dedicated players will be glad to hear there can be a high skill ceiling as well.

name: Operation Kyiv
description: Operation "Kyiv"": Immerse yourself in intense FPS battles on the territory of Irpin, Bucha, Gostomel, Сhernihiv and the M0-6 highway. Authentic combat, strategic firefights that determine the fate of Kiev. Are you ready to fight?"

name: Lisa Total Investigation!
description: Lisa Total Investigation is an adult game about corruption. Play as the future husband of Lisa, who was forced into an investigation by a mysterious Scotland Yard officer. How far will you push your fiancée to successfully complete this investigation? Beware of your most perverse desire!

name: Aim Trainer: Shooting Range
description: Aim Trainer - Shooting Range is a casual shooting game that includes a variety of exciting and fun game modes and a extensive weapon upgrade system. Train your shooting skills, collect different types of weapons, and become an excellent shooter elite!

name: Sling Puzzle: Golf Master
description: Have you ever imagined what happens to the world when gravity is not always downward? In an inverted city, you will walk over walls and fall into the sky. In the game, you will explore in the intricate gravity space, break the traps, solve the puzzles, and discover the path to the end.

name: Corporate Pussy
description: Corporate pussy is an adult visual novel with point&click elements. Dive into the office life as a corporate worker, interact with hot colleagues and become the big boss.

name: Smash and Bash Monsters
description: An addicting Clicker-Looter game where you defeat Thousands of monsters to loot equipment and get stronger, that can be as Relaxing or Frenetic as you like!

name: Ice Land
description: A game that simulates survival in harsh cold environments, including game elements such as environmental exploration, technology development, and character development.

name: Neon Fuga
description: The spaceship pulls into a kaleidoscope of bizarre and dangerous worlds full of aggressive creatures. Will it be possible to break through the waves of enemies, and return back to the familiar space?

name: Invasion: Tales of Tower Defense
description: Can you defeat an enemy that learns from you? Invasion it's a strategy game in which the enemy learns from you and implements changes to the attacks so they can win the upcoming war. During this journey, you have to unlock different towers and upgrade them to stop the invasion

name: House of Jigsaw: A Day at the Park
description: Experience the charm and vibrancy of a leisurely day outdoors with House of Jigsaw: A Day at the Park DLC.

name: Alex's Hope & Alex's Solitude
description: A boy regains his hope and a girl finds herself in solitude. A kinetic novel telling the stories of two young adults overcoming their darkest days.

name: Stranded
description: Explore, collect and build in this action roguelike, create bases, hire allies, evolve your character and level up as far as you can handle!

name: Slay the Minotaur
description: Sin descripción

name: Panoptia
description: Panoptia is a narrative-driven atmospheric exploration game about a strange building called Panoptia that has mysteriously appeared in town. No one knows what secrets hides in its depths. Uncover these secrets if you hope to ever escape...

name: Super RPS
description: Super RPS is a tactical strategy game in which two players have a series of Rock, Paper, Scissors matches on 5 fields concurrently. Each player has a secondary deck of "Field Cards" that have special abilities that can turn the match in your favor.

name: Train Valley Collection
description: Embark on a lighthearted rail journey with our Train Valley Collection! This exclusive package brings together the classic Train Valley: Console Edition and its sequel, Train Valley 2: Community Edition. Jump aboard and transfer between these two fantastic management and puzzle experiences. Travel from the real-world stations of the first Train Valley to the thrilling landscapes of Train Valley 2. It's a bundled ticket for double the excitement and twice the train-routing fun. Get ready to navigate the tracks and explore the unique challenges that await this extraordinary train adventure. All aboard for a bundled ride you won't want to miss!

name: Rich Everyone
description: The game simulates the life restoration of ancient Chinese farmers in scientific farming, vegetable planting, animal husbandry, and various handicraft workshops. Free simulation construction.
